AbandonedChild23.title: đứa trẻ bị bỏ rơi
AbandonedChild23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] sinh ra ốm yếu. Nghĩ rằng [PAWN_pronoun] sẽ chỉ gây gánh nặng cho bộ lạc, cha mẹ [PAWN_possessive] đã bỏ [PAWN_objective] vào trong các nguyên tố của tự nhiên. Bằng cách nào đó, [PAWN_pronoun] đã sống sót.

AbandonedOrphan61.title: trẻ mồ côi bị bỏ rơi
AbandonedOrphan61.desc: Bị bỏ rơi khi sinh ra, [PAWN_nameDef] trẻ bắt đầu cuộc sống [PAWN_possessive] trong trại trẻ mồ côi.\n\nNgoài một kẻ bất lương và vô lại, [PAWN_pronoun] còn là một kẻ gây rối khôn khéo.

Abductee43.title: kẻ bị bắt cóc
Abductee43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã bị xenohumans bắt cóc khi [PAWN_pronoun] vẫn còn là một em bé. Họ đã thử nghiệm trên [PAWN_objective] để hiểu cấu trúc di truyền của anh ấy.\n\nKhi [PAWN_pronoun] lớn lên, [PAWN_nameDef] phát triển hơi lớn một chút và quá mạnh mẽ so với những kẻ đã bắt giữ anh ta và cuối cùng anh ta đã đã trốn thoát.

AcademyStudent58.title: sinh viên khoa học
AcademyStudent58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã đi học như một học viên không gian tốt. Anh ta rất cao và được biết đến với vẻ ngoài điển trai.\n\nAnh ta lo lắng nhiều hơn về kiểu tóc của mình so với điểm số, và bằng cách nào đó anh ta vẫn vượt qua các kỳ thi cuối cùng.

AccursedChild88.title: đứa trẻ bị nguyền rủa
AccursedChild88.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] được sinh ra ở cực điểm của nguyệt thực. Các trưởng lão tuyên bố [PAWN_objective] là một đứa trẻ của bóng tối và mang [PAWN_objective] về nuôi dưỡng dưới sự chăm sóc của họ.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] dành toàn bộ thời thơ ấu để nghiên cứu truyền thuyết và nghi thức của [PAWN_possessive] - chờ đợi cho đến ngày được gọi.

AceFighterPilot54.title: phi công chiến đấu giỏi nhất
AceFighterPilot54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] tốt nghiệp Học Viện Ngôi Sao với danh dự và nổi bật là một phi công chiến đấu át chủ bài trong ba chiến dịch chống lại các nền văn hóa xâm lược tiên tiến hơn.\n\nTuy nhiên, sau một trận chiến tàn khốc, anh thấy mình bị mắc kẹt và tàu sân bay của anh bị phá hủy. Không còn nơi nào để đi, anh bước vào nhóm trốn thoát và cầu nguyện.

AcolyteOfStars6.title: linh mục của các vì sao
AcolyteOfStars6.desc: Từng là người mơ mộng, [PAWN_nameDef] đã đi khắp vũ trụ để tìm thấy thứ mà anh cảm thấy đang gọi cho anh.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] trở nên nghèo hơn và nghèo hơn, nhưng sử dụng mọi cách có thể để tiếp tục.

Actor72.title: diễn viên
Actor72.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã đi du lịch về quê hương [PAWN_possessive] với một công ty diễn viên, chơi ở các nhà hát chật cứng và yêu khán giả ở khắp mọi nơi. [PAWN_pronoun] là người cầu toàn, và đã tạo ra [PAWN_possessive] đạo cụ và trang phục riêng thay vì sử dụng những thứ [PAWN_pronoun] đã được đưa ra.

AddictionCounsel60.title: Addiction counsel
AddictionCounsel60.desc: After recovering from a joywire addiction, NAME adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.\n\nTravelling between communities, HE used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

Adventurer19.title: Adventurer
Adventurer19.desc: NAME's thirst for adventure took HIM to many planets. HECAP visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in HIS quest to find novelty and excitement.\n\nHECAP worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, HE hated cooking the most.

AdventuringChild30.title: Adventuring child
AdventuringChild30.desc: Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.\n\nOne night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

AdventurousWeirdo55.title: Adventurous weirdo
AdventurousWeirdo55.desc: A creative but strange individual, NAME dedicated his life to his twin passions of medieval world history and high technology.\n\nHECAP was fascinated by the idea of becoming a 'skyknight' with glittering armor and a giant sword.

AdventurousYouth70.title: Adventurous youth
AdventurousYouth70.desc: NAME explored all around HIS family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.\n\nDuring his teenage years, NAME made numerous enemies

AerospaceEngineer44.title: Aerospace engineer
AerospaceEngineer44.desc: NAME was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. HECAP focused on improving production lines, and was known for HIS mastery of technical and research issues.

AIProgrammer22.title: AI programmer
AIProgrammer22.desc: Michael enlisted in the military's robotics division, developing smarter combat AI.\n\nThe whole time he was there, he never spoke with another human. He spent all his time conversing with the AI he was developing.

AIResearcher94.title: AI researcher
AIResearcher94.desc: Dave was a renowned researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. His friendships with the artificial minds he created gave him the confidence to interact with real people, and he soon excelled at personal communication.

AlcoholicTrucker93.title: Alcoholic trucker
AlcoholicTrucker93.desc: NAME was a space trucker working for Arcknight Industries when he killed his wife and daughter in a crash.\n\nHis body was repaired with an experimental nano-genetic therapy. Now his muscles continually regenerate and harden, and every movement tears the tissue anew. He bears the pain in silence.

AmateurAstronomer77.title: Amateur astronomer
AmateurAstronomer77.desc: NAME was fascinated with astronomy. HECAP would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.\n\nHECAP is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

AmateurBotanist79.title: Amateur botanist
AmateurBotanist79.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

AmateurEngineer3.title: Amateur engineer
AmateurEngineer3.desc: NAME grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. HECAP wanted to join the army but his father didn't like the idea, so HIS interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. HECAP secretly hoped that this would one day lead him to a life of galactic exploration.

AnarchistRebel77.title: phiến quân vô chính phủ
AnarchistRebel77.desc: Sau khi bị bỏ rơi trong một hoạt động đặc biệt, [PAWN_nameDef] đã thề báo thù nhà nước. [PAWN_pronoun] đã thành lập một nhóm vô chính phủ chuyên hạ bệ các chính phủ thế giới cốt lõi.\n\nSau khi có quá nhiều cuộc gọi gần gũi và quá ít thành công, [PAWN_nameDef] đã trốn ra rìa ngoài thế giới.

AngryStudent88.title: Angry student
AngryStudent88.desc: NAME trained towards HIS dream of working for his hometown's local council.\n\nFor reasons he never quite understood, HE was bullied relentlessly by his classmates. HECAP chose to repress his rage.

AnimalCaretaker20.title: Animal caretaker
AnimalCaretaker20.desc: Born on a medieval farm, NAME was tasked with caring for domestic animals. HECAP grew to love them.\n\nWith time, HE learned to tame wild animals. HECAP dreamed of one day meeting a thrumbo and taming it.

AnimalLabTech39.title: phòng thí nghiệm công nghệ động vật
AnimalLabTech39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] làm kỹ thuật viên trong phòng thí nghiệm nghiên cứu động vật.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã dành [PAWN_possessive] vài ngày để chăm sóc động vật và dọn dẹp sau khi chúng ị. [PAWN_pronoun] mơ ước có một phòng thí nghiệm riêng [PAWN_possessive] vào một ngày nào đó.

AntisocialChild83.title: Antisocial child
AntisocialChild83.desc: NAME lacked typical social skills, and avoided social interaction.\n\nHECAP gained satisfaction only from steady work. HECAP especially disliked speaking with overly creative or outgoing individuals.

ApocalypseChild23.title: Apocalypse child
ApocalypseChild23.desc: NAME spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.\n\nHe told everyone that he had no luck.

ApocalypseSurvivor23.title: Apocalypse survivor
ApocalypseSurvivor23.desc: NAME was born during a time of unrest on HIS homeworld, as climate change threatened mass starvation and flooding. As HE grew up the situation worsened - billions died and peaceful states descended into anarchy. NAME and HIS parents did whatever they had to to survive.

ApprenticeOracle83.title: Apprentice oracle
ApprenticeOracle83.desc: NAME was chosen at an early age by the village elders to keep the sacred rituals of the Oracle.\n\nAn irrepressibly curious child, NAME caused a religious crisis for HIS tribe when HE accidentally flipped a switch to open the "tombs" of the Gods - cryptosleep caskets inhabited by some very confused ancestors.

ApprenticeSmith37.title: Apprentice smith
ApprenticeSmith37.desc:
NAME grew up helping in his father's smithy.

They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.

Sometimes, after work, NAME would practice using the swords HE forged.

Archaeologist85.title: Nhà khảo cổ học
Archaeologist85.desc: [PAWN_pronoun] đã bị mắc kẹt trong một cuộc sống không mệt mỏi. Một ngày nọ, [PAWN_pronoun] nhảy lên một con tàu để tìm hiểu khảo cổ học và xem vũ trụ.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã học cách sống sót. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng đã học về con người - mặc dù [PAWN_pronoun] hiểu người chết tốt hơn người sống.

Architect28.title: Architect
Architect28.desc: NAME designed and constructed buildings. On HIS glitterworld home, most of the technical aspects of architecture were handled by an AI. This enabled HIM to push the artistic limits of the craft, but also meant HE never had to get HIS hands dirty at building sites.

ArchotechSpy75.title: Archotech spy
ArchotechSpy75.desc: NAME was a cybernetic researcher. Studying a transcended world, HE became too involved with HIS subjects. Over time, the archotech machine core recruited HIM into its service, and used HIM as a spy.\n\nWhen HE later rebelled against HIS non-human master, it sent mechanoids across space to hunt HIM down.

ArmyCook0.title: Army cook
ArmyCook0.desc: Ben joined the army as a worker and spent most of his time cooking and repairing. While he was stationed on a dangerous planet, he underwent basic shooting and survival training.

ArmyScientist35.title: Army scientist
ArmyScientist35.desc: NAME did scientific research for a planetary army. HECAP studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

ArmySergeant16.title: Army sergeant
ArmySergeant16.desc: NAME served in HIS nation's military, commanding small units as a non-commissioned officer.\n\nHECAP excelled creating tactically sound plans despite difficult circumstances.

Aromatherapist80.title: Aromatherapist
Aromatherapist80.desc: NAME practiced aromatherapy, using essences extracted from home-grown plants.

ArtfulDodger78.title: Artful dodger
ArtfulDodger78.desc: Robin grew up on one of the urbworlds and had to fend for himself all his life. He never trusted anyone, relying on his persuasiveness and cunning to survive.\n\nHe soon became skilled with firearms and knives as well as words.

ArtifactHunter48.title: Artifact hunter
ArtifactHunter48.desc: NAME became depressed and lost interest in life. HECAP travelled from planet to planet, searching for psychic artifacts amid mechanoid ruins in the hope that they would cure the pain in HIS soul.\n\nA steady trigger finger and careful planning kept NAME alive.

ArtificerRampant95.title: Artificer rampant
ArtificerRampant95.desc: Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.\n\nHECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

ArtisanFarmer23.title: Artisan farmer
ArtisanFarmer23.desc: NAME grew up on a HIS family's glitterworld farm. They were one of the last farms on the planet that preferred traditional farming methods to glitterworld technology.

ArtisticWeirdo56.title: Artistic weirdo
ArtisticWeirdo56.desc: NAME grew up in a house near a bustling midworld metropolis.\n\nHECAP was talented at art and creative work, but often acted strangely, and thus had few friends.

AsceticPriest84.title: Ascetic priest
AsceticPriest84.desc: After taking a vow of silence, NAME joined a monastery on a peaceful backwater planet to spend HIS days in quiet contemplation.\n\nHECAP found happiness growing vegetables in the garden and making cheese in the monastery cellars.

AspergersRebel13.title: Aspergers rebel
AspergersRebel13.desc: NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.\n\nHISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

AspiringEngineer58.title: Aspiring engineer
AspiringEngineer58.desc: NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find.\n\nHECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

AspiringPhysicist47.title: Nhà vật lý khao khát
AspiringPhysicist47.desc: Con gái của một kỹ sư và bác sĩ, cuộc sống ban đầu của NAME rất giàu trí tuệ. Sau khi đến thăm một phòng thí nghiệm vật lý, cô quyết định muốn trở thành một nhà vật lý lượng tử.\n\nBị lạc đà cắn, bị đá bởi ngựa và bị chó dí, NAME đã phát triển một nỗi sợ động vật.

AspiringPopIdol28.title: Aspiring pop idol
AspiringPopIdol28.desc: Min was being trained in song and dance to become the next big pop idol. She grew up being taken care of by company handlers.\n\nShe never knew manual labor, but learned a lot about music and social etiquette.

Assassin20.title: Assassin
Assassin20.desc: NAME was a professional assassin. HECAP was cold, calculating, and made a good profit. In this business, an utter lack of empathy was an asset.

Athlete47.title: Athlete
Athlete47.desc: NAME was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.\n\nBecause of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

AwkwardNerd48.title: Awkward nerd
AwkwardNerd48.desc: Always fascinated by machines, Dave spent his time studying robotics and holography. He preferred the company of his scientific creations to that of other people.

AWOLSoldier49.title: AWOL soldier
AWOLSoldier49.desc: NAME was an infantryman.\n\nWhen HE was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HE decided HE did not want to be a soldier. HECAP was able to escape via military spacejet.

BanditLeader74.title: Bandit leader
BanditLeader74.desc: NAME rose up the ranks of the crime organization, eventually becoming the leader of one of their most remote cells of bandits. His dog Rest never left his side.

BanishedSoldier85.title: Banished soldier
BanishedSoldier85.desc: NAME became the most physically intimidating of the slaves, spending his little free time obsessively sculpting his body. His efforts eventually paid off when the lord offered him a job as a personal bodyguard.\n\nLater, when he plotted to use his position to kill the lord and free the slaves, he was discovered and barely escaped with his life.

Bartender62.title: Bartender
Bartender62.desc: NAME worked as a bartender on a seedy space station. The job entailed one part drink mixing, one part diplomacy, and one part head-bashing.

BattlefieldTech52.title: Battlefield tech
BattlefieldTech52.desc: NAME had received firearms training, but HIS work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.\n\nHECAP developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged him from service.

BattleMechanic27.title: Battle mechanic
BattleMechanic27.desc: NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.\n\nHECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

BeastSlayer67.title: Beast slayer
BeastSlayer67.desc: NAME traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. HECAP would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about HIS prey before striking. HECAP most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.\n\nPreferring to work alone, NAME enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BehaviourResearch74.title: Behaviour research
BehaviourResearch74.desc: Captured as a feral child, NAME was forced into the ways of modern society. HECAP quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.\n\nHECAP specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. HECAP never had interest in plants, however.

BiosphereManager95.title: Biosphere manager
BiosphereManager95.desc: NAME lived on a peaceful glitterworld where all menial work was done by robots and people devoted themselves to leisure. HECAP managed the plant and animal life of a sprawling park, where citizens came to admire the natural beauty.

BlackjackPlayer76.title: Blackjack player
BlackjackPlayer76.desc: The only useful skill NAME learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.\n\nWhen he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

Blacksmith7.title: thợ rèn
Blacksmith7.desc: Là một thợ rèn trên một thế giới thời trung cổ, [PAWN_nameDef] đã nổi tiếng với công viêc đạt chất lượng cao của [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng không tệ khi sử dụng thanh kiếm mà [PAWN_pronoun] rèn được.

Blacksmith72.title: thợ rèn
Blacksmith72.desc: Là một thợ rèn trên một thế giới thời trung cổ, [PAWN_nameDef] đã nổi tiếng với công viêc đạt chất lượng cao của [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng không tệ khi sử dụng thanh kiếm mà [PAWN_pronoun] rèn được.

BlacksmithShooter21.title: Blacksmith shooter
BlacksmithShooter21.desc: As a young blacksmith, NAME's family shop was raided by the police. HECAP shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.\n\nSentenced to life in prison, NAME learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

BlacksmithsSon73.title: Blacksmith's son
BlacksmithsSon73.desc: NAME's father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. NAME would help his father whenever he could.\n\nLater, HIS father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. NAME also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlessedChild46.title: Blessed child
BlessedChild46.desc: NAME was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout HIS childhood.\n\nHECAP learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

BloodgameSurvivor6.title: Bloodgame survivor
BloodgameSurvivor6.desc: NAME was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.\n \nHISCAP manipulative nature made HIM quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

BloodyDentist9.title: Bloody dentist
BloodyDentist9.desc: After studying at a famous college, NAME's weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. HECAP went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under HIS care.\n\nAfter a pursuit, HE managed to escape HIS planet and travel to a new world.

BloodyWanderer28.title: Bloody wanderer
BloodyWanderer28.desc: NAME was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.\n\nOne day, he had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. HECAP eventually calmed, but HIS bloodlust never left HIM.

Bodyguard58.title: Bodyguard
Bodyguard58.desc: NAME found work on a midworld, protecting whoever paid HIM from harm. HECAP gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for HIS ruthlessness against those who crossed HIM.

BodyguardTrainee54.title: Bodyguard trainee
BodyguardTrainee54.desc: NAME was born into a famously skilled family of bodyguards. HISCAP mothers Elena and Victoria forced HIM into many dangerous situations, training HIM to put HIS client's well-being over HIS own.\n\nNAME was taught about many herbs and natural poisons to help HIM prevent clients from being poisoned.

BoneCollector14.title: Bone collector
BoneCollector14.desc: Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history.\n\nThough never a tough or social boy, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Bookworm3.title: Bookworm
Bookworm3.desc: NAME spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

BountyHunter41.title: thợ săn tiền thưởng
BountyHunter41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một thợ săn tiền thưởng trên một thế giới long lanh đồ sộ. [PAWN_pronoun] đã thực hiện các nhiệm vụ nhạy cảm cho các khách hàng cực kỳ giàu có và được biết đến với việc thực hiện êm thắm và dứt khoát.

BountyHunter93.title: thợ săn tiền thưởng
BountyHunter93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một thợ săn tiền thưởng tự chủ. [PAWN_pronoun] đã dành suốt ngày [PAWN_possessive] để săn lùng cướp biển không gian và thu thập tiền thưởng.

BoyScout42.title: Boy scout
BoyScout42.desc: NAME was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.\n\nHe learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

BoySoldier14.title: Boy soldier
BoySoldier14.desc: War may never change - but the cast of characters does.\n\nBorn on a violent urbworld, NAME was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

Brigand68.title: Brigand
Brigand68.desc: NAME flew with a band of brigands HE called friends. HE even had a ship of HIS own - The Dung Mucker 2000.

BrothelGofer84.title: Brothel gofer
BrothelGofer84.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

BrutalThief59.title: Brutal thief
BrutalThief59.desc: Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets.\n\nKnowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

BunkerKid41.title: đứa trẻ trong hầm
BunkerKid41.desc: Ricardo lớn lên trong một nơi trú ẩn dưới lòng đất, chờ bụi phóng xạ lắng xuống. Gia đình giàu có của anh ta đã có được quyền truy cập vào một thành phố hầm trú ẩn sang trọng, trong khi hàng tỷ người chết trên bề mặt.\n\nXác định một ngày nào đó để tìm cách trả thù kẻ thù đáng ghét, Ricardo đã dành phần lớn thời gian của mình để thực hành bắn súng trong cơ sở đào tạo tư nhân của mình.

BushSniper94.title: Bush sniper
BushSniper94.desc: NAME's peaceful life was cut short when HIS country was brutally invaded.\n\nNAME was drafted into service as soon as HE was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. HECAP spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

BusinessGangster58.title: Business gangster
BusinessGangster58.desc: Staying one step ahead of the law, NAME became a legitimate businessman and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, NAME's good fortune continued while his competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

Cadet96.title: Cadet
Cadet96.desc: Born on the planet New China, NAME's father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.\n\nNAME had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. HECAP came to abhor violence.

CaravanChild29.title: Caravan child
CaravanChild29.desc: NAME was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother’s things all the time.\n\nEventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

Caravaneer53.title: Caravaneer
Caravaneer53.desc: NAME was the leader of a caravan. HECAP was responsible for the safety of HIS caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.\n\nHECAP and HIS people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

CaravanTraveler6.title: Caravan traveler
CaravanTraveler6.desc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, NAME was mentored by HIS father in the ways of being a trader. HECAP was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to HIS nomadic lifestyle, HE hunted and bartered for HIS food.

CargoPilot58.title: Cargo pilot
CargoPilot58.desc: NAME was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. HECAP perfected HIS skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

CasketBuilder52.title: Casket builder
CasketBuilder52.desc: NAME was fascinated with cryosleep, and spent HIS life learning about the mysterious technology.\n\nWorking as an assembler on a midworld, NAME built an experimental prototype casket from discarded parts. Unfortunately, while HE was searching for the final component, HIS home was leveled by a bomb.

Castaway57.title: vô gia cư
Castaway57.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một hành khách trên đường vận chuyển giữa các vì sao thông thường. Khi con tàu của anh ta bị phá hủy, anh ta sống như một người vô gia cư trên một hành tinh không có người ở trong nhiều năm.

CatHerder4.title: Cat herder
CatHerder4.desc: NAME helped out in his father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats.\n\nWhen he refused to clean up after the cats, HE was transferred to the breeding science division.

CaveChild17.title: đứa con hang động
CaveChild17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một hang động trên hành tinh vùng lãnh nguyên và được một nhóm giải trí du lịch nhặt chỉ biết đến với tên gọi Phù thủy. Từng là thành viên của một phi hành đoàn, các Phù thủy đã kể cho [PAWN_objective] những câu chuyện kỳ diệu về vũ trụ.\n\nMột ngày, các Phù thủy không trở về sau khi nhặt rác. Sau nhiều năm chờ đợi, [PAWN_nameDef] lên đường vào không gian để tìm họ.

CaveChild30.title: Cave child
CaveChild30.desc: NAME grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. HECAP helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

CaveworldIlluminator23.title: chiếu sáng hang động
CaveworldIlluminator23.desc: Trong số những người sống trong đường hầm, những người có tầm nhìn mạnh mẽ như [PAWN_nameDef] thì được tôn sùng như những nhà hiền triết. [PAWN_pronoun] sẽ dẫn đường, đánh dấu các điểm để đào bằng nấm phát quang sinh học và cảnh báo những người khác về nguy hiểm sắp xảy ra.

CaveworldTender20.title: Caveworld tender
CaveworldTender20.desc: NAME grew up in cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world. HECAP worked with the other children tending the tribe’s fungus crops.

CaveworldTunneler48.title: Caveworld tunneler
CaveworldTunneler48.desc: NAME worked as a digger in the massive underground cave complex.\n\nHECAP knows rock so well that HE can almost navigate caves by smell.

CharityWorker36.title: Charity worker
CharityWorker36.desc: Glitterworlds are havens of safety and comfort for those lucky enough to live there, but NAME could not ignore nearby planets where people suffered in poverty. HECAP spent HIS working life appealing for donations and supporting those in need.

Chemist73.title: nhà hóa học
Chemist73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một nhà hóa học nghiên cứu. [PAWN_pronoun] đã làm việc với các hóa chất, từ dược phẩm đến chất nổ, để phát triển các chất và phương pháp điều trị mới.

Chemist78.title: Chemist
Chemist78.desc: NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

ChessMaster67.title: Chess master
ChessMaster67.desc: NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves. \n\nHECAP never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

ChiefEngineer62.title: Chief engineer
ChiefEngineer62.desc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, NAME was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.\n\nShe relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

ChildKnave69.title: Child-knave
ChildKnave69.desc: NAME was a child-knave of King Loteric. HECAP enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. HECAP adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.\n\nHECAP served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

ChildOfDrifters18.title: Child of drifters
ChildOfDrifters18.desc: Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

ChildOfGlass61.title: Child of glass
ChildOfGlass61.desc: NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.\n\nTo survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

ChildProdigy76.title: Child prodigy
ChildProdigy76.desc: After graduating college at age twelve, Jered devoted his life to becoming immortal. However his research crossed the line when he tried to modify his body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. He was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

ChildResearcher32.title: Child researcher
ChildResearcher32.desc: A frightfully intelligent child, NAME was kidnapped by a glitterworld corporation and forced to research technologies for weaponizing anti-matter.\n\nHECAP vowed never to invent anything again.

ChildScientist30.title: nhà khoa học trẻ tuổi
ChildScientist30.desc: Sau khi tốt nghiệp đại học rất trẻ, [PAWN_nameDef] đã cống hiến [PAWN_possessive] để trở thành bất tử. Anh ta đã bị bắt vì cố gắng tự sửa đổi gen.\n\n Các nhà chức trách đã phát hành [PAWN_objective] với điều kiện anh ta sẽ làm việc trong phòng thí nghiệm của chính phủ về công nghệ tàu vũ trụ. Ông được phép tiếp tục nghiên cứu cá nhân trong thời gian rảnh rỗi.

ChildSlave58.title: Child slave
ChildSlave58.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

ChildSpy47.title: điệp viên nhí
ChildSpy47.desc: Trẻ em thường được cho là vô tội nên rất lý tưởng để làm gián điệp. [PAWN_nameDef] đã được đào tạo về nghệ thuật xâm nhập và thu thập thông tin khi [PAWN_pronoun] còn rất trẻ.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] đã thu thập nhiều thông tin quan trọng sau nhiều năm lẩn trong hàng ngũ của kẻ thù. Trong thời gian này, [PAWN_pronoun] không được ăn học đàng hoàng.

ChildStar74.title: Child star
ChildStar74.desc: NAME was well-known throughout HIS homeworld as a child actor in films and TV shows. HISCAP fame put HIM in contact with many different kinds of people, but also tended to get in the way of HIS education.

CircusPerformer93.title: Circus performer
CircusPerformer93.desc: Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.\n\nA mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CivilEngineer2.title: Civil engineer
CivilEngineer2.desc: NAME was a well-known civil engineer. HISCAP job involved designing and maintaining rock fortification structures. HECAP did enough statistical analysis to keep his mind sharp.

CivilServant2.title: Civil servant
CivilServant2.desc: NAME worked as a low-ranking administrator for a moribund government bureaucracy. HECAP is most at home filling out complicated paperwork and playing office politics.

ClanChief14.title: Clan chief
ClanChief14.desc: NAME managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

ClassClown96.title: Class clown
ClassClown96.desc: In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, NAME always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.\n\nHECAP developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CloneFarmed21.title: Clone-farmed
CloneFarmed21.desc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer58.title: Clone farmer
CloneFarmer58.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

ColiseumCleaner54.title: Coliseum cleaner
ColiseumCleaner54.desc: During the 'Inner Destrian War' fallout, HIS parents were captured and HE was born into a life of slavery. Forced to clean coliseums after bloody battles for money. Watching, waiting, and learning. Coliseums were the only thing HE ever knew. One night while cleaning the coliseum, HIS family was murdered.

ColiseumFighter22.title: Coliseum fighter
ColiseumFighter22.desc: Applying the knowledge that he gained from years around fighters, HE became a successful gladiator in the coliseum that he once cleaned.

ColonialGovernor78.title: Colonial governor
ColonialGovernor78.desc: Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, Henry ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced him out of power.\n\nHe left the community to return to his life as a marshal.

ColonyEngineer7.title: kỹ sư thuộc địa
ColonyEngineer7.desc: Bọn trẻ đã tiếp quản cơ sở và chúng tuyên bố độc lập khỏi tập đoàn.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] đã sử dụng hệ thống VR để trở thành một kỹ sư bậc thầy, và anh ta làm việc siêng năng để chuẩn bị thuộc địa cho sự đánh trả của tập đoàn.

ColonyKid47.title: Colony kid
ColonyKid47.desc: NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine.\n\nNAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

ColonySettler53.title: Cư dân thuộc đia
ColonySettler53.desc: NAME là người định cư trên một thế giới thuộc địa mới.\n\nMột cuộc sống như vậy đòi hỏi một giao dịch cơ bản là bắt tay với tất cả.

ComaChild57.title: Coma child
ComaChild57.desc: A childhood accident put NAME into a coma. HECAP didn’t wake up until HE was in HIS late teens. HISCAP body never recovered from the years of inactivity, but people tend to take pity on HIM when they hear HIS story.

CombatEngineer30.title: Combat engineer
CombatEngineer30.desc: NAME became a combat engineer. HE built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when HE wasn't shooting at people, that is.

CombatEngineer4.title: Kỹ sư chiến đấu
CombatEngineer4.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] trở thành kỹ sư chiến đấu. [PAWN_pronoun] đã xây dựng căn cứ, súng cố định và phương tiện sửa chữa cho quân đội - khi [PAWN_pronoun] không bắn vào người, đó là.

CombatMedic82.title: Combat medic
CombatMedic82.desc: After his home country entered a large-scale war, Felix was drafted into the army as a combat medic.\n\nHis few years in the trenches trying to keep his fellow soldiers alive gave him an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made him stoic and reserved.

CombatMedtech59.title: Combat medtech
CombatMedtech59.desc: As a military medtech, NAME's job was to fix and build anything he could get HIS hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.\n\nSent into dangerous areas, HE never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

CombatNegotiator31.title: Combat negotiator
CombatNegotiator31.desc: After escaping his homeworld, NAME took his skills to the stars.\n\nHe chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. His specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

CommonerHeir5.title: Người thừa kế thường dân
CommonerHeir5.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một kẻ láu cá đường phố trên một thế giới hơi nước phong kiến.\n\nSau khi [PAWN_pronoun] cố gắng đánh cắp thức ăn từ cung điện, hoàng đế, tuyệt vọng bảo vệ người thừa kế, đưa [PAWN_objective] vào và chải chuốt [PAWN_objective] để tiếp tục thừa kế ngai vàng.

CommonerLord45.title: Chúa tể thường dân
CommonerLord45.desc: Sau nhiều năm đào tạo về võ thuật và ngoại giao, [PAWN_nameDef] cuối cùng đã được trao đất và quân đội của [PAWN_possessive] để cai trị.\n\nVì di sản chung của [PAWN_nameDef], các lãnh chúa khác không chấp thuận. Họ gán cho [PAWN_objective] một tội ác ghê tởm và hoàng đế không còn lựa chọn nào khác ngoài việc lưu đày [PAWN_objective].

ComputerEngineer10.title: Computer engineer
ComputerEngineer10.desc: Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".\n\nWith his wife Morgan, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

ConArtist80.title: Con artist
ConArtist80.desc: NAME never created anything in HIS life. HECAP did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give HIM what they had created.

ConceptualArtist39.title: Conceptual artist
ConceptualArtist39.desc: NAME was well-known in art circles on HIS home world for HIS unique and creative conceptual artworks.\n\nNobody was sure exactly what HE was trying to communicate, but HIS pieces were highly valued by collectors.

ConstructionEngineer32.title: Construction engineer
ConstructionEngineer32.desc: NAME was a construction worker on a midworld. HECAP lead a team which built everything from office blocks to cathedrals.\n\nHISCAP busy job and numerous nearby fast-food outlets meant HE never cooked for HIMself.

ConstructionGrunt84.title: Construction grunt
ConstructionGrunt84.desc: Growing up in his father's lab, Jackson was given the life of an intellectual elite. He got everything he desired, and price was never an object.\n\nHowever Jackson did not partake in the luxury given to him. Instead, he pursued more physical, and - in his father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

ConventChild16.title: Convent child
ConventChild16.desc: The child of an illicit affair, NAME was bought up by nuns in a medieval convent. HECAP learned the value of hard work and submission, but was taught that technology is heretical.

CoreDilettante33.title: Core dilettante
CoreDilettante33.desc: Candice spent her formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where she and her friends pursued lives of idle pleasure.\n\nAs she grew up, she began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. She decided to look for a more challenging path.

CorpBredStudent54.title: Corp-bred student
CorpBredStudent54.desc: NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations.\n\nAt age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorporateBuilder58.title: Corporate builder
CorporateBuilder58.desc: Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.\n\nUnfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

CorporateSlave22.title: tập đoàn nô lệ
CorporateSlave22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên ở một thuộc địa thuộc sở hữu của một tập đoàn long lanh lớn. Tất cả trẻ em đều có các thiết bị thực tế ảo gắn liền với vũ lực và được nuôi dưỡng trong một thế giới kỹ thuật số tàn bạo.\n\nLiên tục bị buộc phải chiến đấu với những người khác để giải trí cho những người giàu có, đấu súng và chiến thuật trở thành trung tâm của vũ trụ [PAWN_nameDef].

CorpResearcher93.title: nhà nghiên cứu tư nhân
CorpResearcher93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là nhà nghiên cứu hàng đầu cho một tập đoàn thám hiểm không gian lớn.

CorpStudent95.title: Corp student
CorpStudent95.desc: De Dion was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned his home planet. His family had been working for that corporation for seven generations.\n\nAt age six, HE started to study at the corporate academy, where he learned to become a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

CosmeticReject64.title: Cosmetic reject
CosmeticReject64.desc: Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.\n\nAfter some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

CosmeticSurgeon36.title: Cosmetic surgeon
CosmeticSurgeon36.desc: NAME had a terrible bedside manner due to HIS abrasiveness. HECAP often bullied HIS patients into getting cosmetic surgery. HECAP made a lot of money this way.\n\nWhile very studious and careful in HIS work, HE never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

CostumeCrafter41.title: thờ may trang phục
CostumeCrafter41.desc: Ban ngày, [PAWN_nameDef] là một nhân viên văn phòng ở midworld. Ban đêm, [PAWN_pronoun] thiết kế và chế tạo trang phục quái vật phức tạp cho các hội nghị khoa học viễn tưởng.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã học được rất nhiều về may vá. Trái lại [PAWN_pronoun] chả nấu được món gì phức tạp ngoài những món ăn liền.

Counselor26.title: Counselor
Counselor26.desc: A terrifying trauma when NAME was a young adult caused HIM to develop a serious eating disorder. With counseling HE learned to have a healthier relationship with food, and decided to put HIS new skills to use helping others overcome their emotional problems.

CountryChild95.title: Country child
CountryChild95.desc: NAME was raised up to fear God and love HIS country. HECAP was a genuine backwoods kid. HECAP always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

CowFarmer39.title: Cow farmer
CowFarmer39.desc: NAME grew up on a rim world, under the tyranny of HIS father, who forced HIM to work every day on the farm. HE dreamed of escaping HIS father and exploring the universe.\n\nOne day, when the trade ship was overhead, HE stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

CraftShaper37.title: Craft shaper
CraftShaper37.desc: NAME locked HIMself in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.\n\nEventually, HIS creations brought HIM the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild39.title: Crime boss' child
CrimeBossChild39.desc: NAME was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. HECAP was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.\n\nWhen the family was attacked, HIS father ordered HIM to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

CrimeLord10.title: Crime lord
CrimeLord10.desc: Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord.\n\nHe relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

CriminalKingpin36.title: Criminal kingpin
CriminalKingpin36.desc: NAME discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.\n\nHaving people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

CriminalSurgeon99.title: Criminal surgeon
CriminalSurgeon99.desc: Being near many injured fellow criminals, NAME took it upon HIMself to work on them.\n\nAlthough many people died, HE did get better at using knives.

CultChild3.title: Cult child
CultChild3.desc: NAME was born into a powerful cult which shunned advanced technology and believed that all illness could be cured by cleansing the soul through sacred art.\n\nAfter HIS first glimpse of the outside world, HE decided to run away.

DataDecoder39.title: Data decoder
DataDecoder39.desc: Born on a glitterworld, NAME was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.\n\nHECAP was effective at self-study, but HE was lacked in social experiences.

DedicatedStudent12.title: Dedicated student
DedicatedStudent12.desc: The child of a wealthy manufacturer, NAME was pampered from an early age. HECAP developed an affinity for reading and art, and a distaste for menial chores.\n\nA revolution brought his father's businesses under state control. Penniless, NAME worked hard to complete HIS education.

DeepSpaceMiner3.title: Deep space miner
DeepSpaceMiner3.desc: NAME did the sweaty, grimy work of pulling metal out of asteroids on a deep space rig. HECAP used HIS hands-on industrial skills daily - and wasn't bad in a bar fight either.

DeepSpaceSurveyor1.title: nhà khảo sát không gian sâu
DeepSpaceSurveyor1.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một nhà khảo sát không gian sâu. Cô đã nghiên cứu những thế giới nào thì phù hợp nhất để thực dân hóa.\n\ntrong cuộc thám hiểm, cô ấy đã gặp phải người dân bản địa thù địch, những phụ nữ không gian được sơn màu xanh lá cây và những người Hy Lạp muốn trở thành thần. Cô đã học cách xây dựng những chiếc máy tiện thô sơ và đại bác đá để chống lại kẻ thù sau khi sống sót qua nhiều trận hỏa hoạn.

Defector78.title: Defector
Defector78.desc: Early in HIS adulthood, NAME decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where HE lived. HISCAP defection was not well-received, and agents were sent out after HIM.\n\nHECAP spent years on the run, treating HIS own wounds so no doctor could betray HIM. The ordeal made HIM bitter and untrusting.

Defector95.title: đào binh
Defector95.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] quyết định rời khỏi chế độ độc tài áp bức nơi [PAWN_pronoun] sống. Cuộc đào tẩu của [PAWN_possessive] không được đón nhận và các đặc vụ đã được phái truy lùng [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] mất nhiều năm trốn chạy. Vì [PAWN_pronoun] không tin tưởng bác sĩ nào, nên [PAWN_pronoun] đã tự điều trị [PAWN_possessive] bị thương. Các thử thách đã làm [PAWN_objective] trở nên ác độc và không đáng tin.

DefenseLawyer71.title: Defense lawyer
DefenseLawyer71.desc: NAME found that HE could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where HIS silver tongue could be useful, HE turned to the law.\n\nHECAP often defended the illegal speeder racers HE grew up with.

DesertRat47.title: Desert rat
DesertRat47.desc: NAME was born to a tribe of desert ascetics who wandered the endless wastes.\n\nThey sought a mythical substance they believed could liberate them from ignorance through psychedelic revelation - and usher in a new period of interstellar peace.

DestroyerGeneral26.title: Destroyer-general
DestroyerGeneral26.desc: NAME held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.\n\nHECAP was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

Digger66.title: Digger
Digger66.desc: NAME and HIS tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. NAME feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

DiplomatsChild97.title: Diplomat's child
DiplomatsChild97.desc: NAME was born in diplomatic family.\n\nTravelling often, HE was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

DisasterSurvivor65.title: người sống sót sau thảm họa
DisasterSurvivor65.desc: Hành tinh của [PAWN_nameDef] va chạm với một mặt trăng nhỏ. Tất cả mọi thứ anh biết như nhà đã bị phá hủy, và cả gia đình anh đều chết. [PAWN_pronoun] bị bỏ lại trong đống đổ nát để tự bảo vệ mình.

DiscardedYouth93.title: Discarded youth
DiscardedYouth93.desc: NAME grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, HE sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.\n\nIn these desperate circumstances, against all odds, HE survived - and thrived.

DischargedSoldier53.title: Discharged soldier
DischargedSoldier53.desc: NAME prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight.\n\nToo smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

DisciplinedFarmer28.title: Disciplined farmer
DisciplinedFarmer28.desc: Drew was the younger of two sons on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. Drew's father was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at his sons to work harder and keep quiet. Drew burnt his hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when his life was in danger.

DisplacedNoble83.title: Displaced noble
DisplacedNoble83.desc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

DoomsdayPariah24.title: Doomsday pariah
DoomsdayPariah24.desc: NAME managed to open a vault of otherworldly technology while scavenging a dig site. HE unwittingly triggered a doomsday device that cleansed the planet of all life. More interested in the tech than human life, HE boarded the vault’s spacecraft and departed to find more relics to abuse.

DreadedBaby56.title: Dreaded baby
DreadedBaby56.desc: NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude58.title: Dreaded dude
DreadedDude58.desc: Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.\n\nThere's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Dreamer79.title: Dreamer
Dreamer79.desc: NAME was an expressive child. HECAP sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.\n\nHECAP hated fighting, but when made angry, HE could be dangerous. HISCAP temper was quick.

Drifter67.title: Drifter
Drifter67.desc: NAME never figured out what to do with HIS life. HECAP travelled often, taking up casual work wherever HE found it.\n\nHECAP also occasionally worked on a novel that HE knew would be a bestseller - just as soon as HE could find a publisher who was interested.

DromedaryKnight37.title: Dromedary knight
DromedaryKnight37.desc: Having caught the eye of HIS people's Sand King, NAME was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.\n\nAlways with a camel to carry his things, HE served HIS sand people faithfully.

Drudge9.title: Drudge
Drudge9.desc: NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like.\n\nHECAP entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

DrugLieutenant98.title: Drug lieutenant
DrugLieutenant98.desc: NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.\n\nHis social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

DrugMule80.title: Drug mule
DrugMule80.desc: Raised in an orphanage, NAME turned towards the gang life at age ten.\n\nHe was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. He took a bullet or two.

DustyFarmHand75.title: Dusty farm hand
DustyFarmHand75.desc: From the time NAME could walk, HE helped take care of the animals and crops that HIS people tended in their arid homeland.\n\nThe work toughened HIM, but left little time for intellectual activities.

Empath47.title: Empath
Empath47.desc: NAME was an incredibly empathetic child, so much that HE was totally overwhelmed by simple social interactions. Once, HE stepped on a bug and felt so guilty HE cried for an hour.\n\nNAME did try to use a gun one time, but it went very poorly, as the loud noise made HIM flinch uncontrollably.

EnergeticPopIdol61.title: Energetic pop idol
EnergeticPopIdol61.desc: Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.\n\nHowever, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

EnergyResearcher89.title: Energy researcher
EnergyResearcher89.desc: NAME was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. HECAP made an error which destroyed HIS lab and most of the city. HECAP fled the planet to escape the authorities.

Engineer40.title: Engineer
Engineer40.desc: NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

EngineeredPilot75.title: Engineered pilot
EngineeredPilot75.desc: After his province was besieged by one of its neighbors, NAME volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that he had helped develop. The modifications allowed him to pilot the ship, but also made him less able to focus on the people around him.\n\nBy this time, people were calling him "Squirrel."

EnvoyOfTheStars19.title: Envoy of the stars
EnvoyOfTheStars19.desc: NAME entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.\n\nHISCAP prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing HIM to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

EscapedConvict90.title: Escaped convict
EscapedConvict90.desc: NAME denies involvement in the crimes that brought about HIS incarceration in a brutal penal colony. HECAP escaped by tunnelling beneath the perimeter using modified cutlery.

Evangelist39.title: Evangelist
Evangelist39.desc: On HIS 21st birthday, NAME experienced a religious awakening. HECAP decided to spend the rest of HIS life spreading the word of HIS deity, the beauty of its culture, and its unusual medical tradition.

ExecutiveOfficer5.title: Executive officer
ExecutiveOfficer5.desc: NAME was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating his way up the corporate ladder, he was framed for the rape and murder of another executive and her family.\n\nHe was found guilty. However, because of his family's influence, he was exiled instead of put to death.

ExiledPrince58.title: Exiled prince
ExiledPrince58.desc: A member of a royal family, NAME was exiled for shaming HIS family.\n\nLiving in a foreign land, mostly alone, HE spent most of HIS time making huts and houses to live in. HECAP found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all his friends and family.

ExiledResearcher44.title: Exiled researcher
ExiledResearcher44.desc: NAME's love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

ExoticChef96.title: Exotic chef
ExoticChef96.desc: NAME has always gone overboard when it comes to food. HECAP is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.\n\nHISCAP quest for ingredients has brought HIM into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

ExpertHandyman8.title: Expert handyman
ExpertHandyman8.desc: NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

Explorer49.title: Explorer
Explorer49.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ExplorerWriter10.title: Explorer-writer
ExplorerWriter10.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. \n\nHISCAP goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

ExplosivesExpert26.title: Explosives expert
ExplosivesExpert26.desc: NAME was an explosive engineer employed in mines. HECAP took HIS job very seriously and was well-versed in the technicalities - so much so that HE refused to demean HIMself by helping with the clean-up once HIS carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

FactionLeader74.title: Faction leader
FactionLeader74.desc: Early in HIS adulthood, NAME found HIMself surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes. \n\nFor fun, HE gathered them and lead them to a certain death. HECAP knew then that HE had the talent to realize HIS ambitions of leadership.

FactoryWorker58.title: Factory worker
FactoryWorker58.desc: Felix grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world.\n\nSince poverty was rampant and food scarce, he worked for whatever wages he could get. This wasn't an easy life, but Felix never shied away from a hard day's work.

FallenOfficial12.title: Fallen official
FallenOfficial12.desc: NAME was an official for an autocratic government.\n\nWhen HIS superiors demanded HE participate in atrocities, NAME resigned and escaped from HIS homeworld with nothing but the clothes on HIS back.

FallenProdigy40.title: Fallen prodigy
FallenProdigy40.desc: NAME was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. HISCAP father was killed in action.\n\nHECAP struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove his right to be there. A child genius, HE was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

FarmBoy64.title: Farm boy
FarmBoy64.desc: John worked on his family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, he avoided softer jobs that might have kept him cooped up inside.\n\nHe enjoyed this lonely work, and tended to stay out of people's way and do his own thing.

FarmerBoy88.title: Farmer boy
FarmerBoy88.desc: Benjamin's parents died in a fire when he was seven. He grew up on his uncle's farm, plowing fields and doing manual labor.\n\nHe could not bear answering questions about his parents, so he replaced social contact with hard work.

FarmersDaughter81.title: Con gái của nông dân
FarmersDaughter81.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trên vườn nho của cha mẹ [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] đã dành tuổi trẻ [PAWN_possessive] để khám phá vùng đất và kết bạn với nhiều loại bọ và côn trùng khác nhau.\n\nKhi nghe được những câu chuyện về tất cả những điều hấp dẫn ngoài vũ trụ, [PAWN_pronoun] luôn mơ ước được mạo hiểm để thấy nó cho bản thân [PAWN_objective].

FarmersSon20.title: Farmer's son
FarmersSon20.desc: Ade spent much of his childhood learning biome farming. In his biome they kept animals to investigate which would cope best in the alien environment.\n\nDue to this, the travel restrictions and oxygen rationing system, he rarely got to meet anyone from outside his family.

FarmHand2.title: Farm hand
FarmHand2.desc: NAME was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.\n\nEverything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including NAME. This helped HIM build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

FarmKid60.title: Farm kid
FarmKid60.desc: NAME grew up on his family's beef farm. He enjoyed working the fields and taking care of the animals.

FarmMechanic1.title: Farm mechanic
FarmMechanic1.desc: Growing up on a farming planet, NAME spent HIS time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

FearfulChef49.title: Fearful chef
FearfulChef49.desc: NAME was a excellent chef who worked in a high-end restaurant.\n\nOne day, HE left the stove on, and accidentally burned down the whole building. This event shook HIM so much that HE swore to never touch a stove again.

FelineScientist76.title: Feline scientist
FelineScientist76.desc: NAME became a renowned scientist in the field of felines. Wanting the best for his animals and specializing in selective breeding, he set out on a journey to find the perfect breeding grounds for his cats.

FeralChild96.title: đứa trẻ hoang dã
FeralChild96.desc: Bị bỏ rơi trên một hành tinh động vật khi còn nhỏ, nhưng một tấm chăn có tên thêu trên đó, Felix đã biến mình thành một người hoang dã.\n\nKhi anh 13 tuổi, anh gặp một nhóm các nhà khảo sát khoáng sản, người đã "chào mời" anh đi ra khỏi hành tinh.

FerventResearcher72.title: Fervent researcher
FerventResearcher72.desc: As a young adult, Holly was sure that her planet and its people were nearing their time of transcendence.\n\nA firm belief that her research would be the catalyst drove her to increasingly alarming acts as bureaucrats and bioethics committees worked to stall her progress.

FeudalFarmBoy0.title: Feudal farm boy
FeudalFarmBoy0.desc: NAME was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.\n\nHe lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

FeudalLordling56.title: Feudal lordling
FeudalLordling56.desc: NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges.\n\nHECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

FighterController67.title: Fighter controller
FighterController67.desc: During the Zartha crisis, Bashkire fought across many worlds, providing the vital link between the ground and the air as a fighter controller. During the campaign, he saw friends injured and killed. This mental trauma haunts his dreams to this day, but his aim remains sharp.

FireKeeper44.title: Fire keeper
FireKeeper44.desc: NAME was responsible for keeping the tribe’s fire going. HECAP took this responsibility very seriously.

FireScarredChild1.title: Fire-scarred child
FireScarredChild1.desc: Duster was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until he fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to his hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, he can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

Flaneur30.title: Flaneur
Flaneur30.desc: NAME strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of HIS world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.\n\nThrough all this time, HE remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

ForestChild83.title: con của rừng
ForestChild83.desc: Khi [PAWN_pronoun] còn bé, mẹ của [PAWN_nameDef] phát điên và bỏ lại [PAWN_objective] trong rừng.\n\nĐược nuôi dưỡng bởi những người hoang dã, [PAWN_nameDef] hiểu được thế nào là yêu thương và giết hại động vật.

ForestProwler15.title: người rừng
ForestProwler15.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] dẫn đầu một nhóm người hoang dã trong rừng. Họ tìm kiếm thức ăn, săn bắn và đôi khi giết hại những người văn minh hơn để đánh cắp những vật thể sáng bóng của họ.

FoundryApprentice76.title: Foundry apprentice
FoundryApprentice76.desc: NAME grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave HIM metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted HIS artistic development.

Freethinker38.title: tự do tư tưởng
Freethinker38.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một thế giới độc hại với các nhà lãnh đạo tàn bạo. Trong khi phần còn lại của dân số tập trung xuất khẩu ma túy, [PAWN_pronoun] đã tham gia một lực lượng dân quân nổi loạn.\n\nSau cuộc hành quân đầy rủi ro chống lại chế độ thất bại, [PAWN_pronoun] đã trốn khỏi hành tinh, sống sót bằng cách đe dọa hủy diệt lẫn nhau bằng một quả bom phản vật chất hành tinh.

FrightenedChild43.title: Frightened child
FrightenedChild43.desc: NAME grew up with a laundry list of phobias and neuroses. HECAP feared, among other things, doctors and foodborne pathogens.\n\nAs a result, HE learned to cook and care for HIMself, but many of HIS fears dog HIM in adulthood.

FrontierMarshal54.title: thống chế biên giới
FrontierMarshal54.desc: Nate là thống chế thuộc địa của anh ta. Anh ta cố gắng tôn trọng luật pháp, nhưng thị trưởng địa phương tham nhũng đã giết chết gia đình anh ta và bỏ mặc anh ta cho đến chết.\n\nSau khi lấy lại được sức khỏe, Nate đã bắt giữ thị trưởng. [PAWN_pronoun] rời quê nhà và bắt đầu một cuộc sống mới lao động hăng say để tạo ra sự khác biệt trong vũ trụ.

Fugitive4.title: Chạy trốn
Fugitive4.desc: NAME đã nổi loạn chống lại tập đoàn mà HE làm đang làm việc. HECAP thất bại, và buộc anh ta phải chạy trốn.\n\nHECAP luôn luôn di chuyển, luôn để lại mọi thứ phía sau. HECAP đã cố gắng để có được những người ủng hộ cho sự nghiệp của mình, nhưng không thành công do các kỹ năng xã hội kém của mình.

GalacticPage37.title: Galactic page
GalacticPage37.desc: NAME served the high admiral of a space fleet. HECAP learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.\n\nIn his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

GameDeveloper95.title: Nhà phát triển game
GameDeveloper95.desc: NAME was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, NAME's career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.

GameFanatic86.title: Game fanatic
GameFanatic86.desc: NAME was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.\n\nOnce, while attempting to prove HIS skills in the real world, HE was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. HECAP escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

GameTester77.title: người khảo sát trò chơi
GameTester77.desc: Tạo ra một cuộc sống mới trên một hành tinh gần như không thể sống được sau chiến tranh hạt nhân, [PAWN_nameDef] đã có thể thực hiện mong muốn của mình bằng tiền vay từ cha mình.\n\nAnh ấy thích chơi một trò giả lập cư dân thuộc địa. Điều yêu thích của anh ta trong trò chơi là xây dựng các bệnh viện phức tạp. Dành phần lớn thời gian để chơi, anh quên đi nỗi kinh hoàng của chiến tranh và nhu cầu trả thù của mình.

GangBoss49.title: Gang boss
GangBoss49.desc: To survive, NAME's gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.\n\nAfter years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

GangMember83.title: thành viên băng đảng
GangMember83.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên vô gia cư trên một Urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] đã bị buộc phải chiến đấu và đấu tranh cho mọi thứ, khiến [PAWN_objective] trở nên khó chịu và tàn nhẫn từ rất lâu trước khi trưởng thành.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] sẽ ở lại những con phố đó, [PAWN_pronoun] không bị thương trong vụ xả súng và cơ thể của anh ta bị tịch thu để sử dụng bởi một trong những tập đoàn cầm quyền của thành phố trên toàn thế giới.

GangSoldier39.title: Gang soldier
GangSoldier39.desc: Living for many years between three raider settlements, NAME persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.\n\nHECAP eventually took control of a violent gang.

Gardener99.title: Gardener
Gardener99.desc: On industrial worlds, wealth concentrates in the hands of those who own the factories and sell the goods. NAME worked at the mansion of one such rich family, tending the lavish gardens as part of a team of servants.

Gatherer70.title: Gatherer
Gatherer70.desc: NAME is a master gatherer. HECAP can find food in the most barren of places using HIS deep knowledge of plants, roots, and berries.

GeneticEngineer89.title: Genetic engineer
GeneticEngineer89.desc: NAME carried out HIS first genetic experiments on farm animals. HECAP soon grew to become quite skilled in all forms of genetic engineering.\n\nA horrifying lab accident left him with a mortal fear of rodents.

GeneticScientist66.title: Genetic scientist
GeneticScientist66.desc: After the war he joined a genetic engineering firm. He worked on enhancements for humans and livestock. His experiences in inflicting and healing wounds were very beneficial to his work, but he developed a black sense of humor. This made social gatherings awkward.

Geologist66.title: Geologist
Geologist66.desc: NAME worked with miners and cave-diggers, identifying rock types and natural formations.\n\nDuring HIS years underground HE also gained experience repairing drilling machines and other technical equipment.

Gigolo30.title: Nô lệ
Gigolo30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã tự bán [PAWN_objective] để thành nô lệ và lấy tiền mua pizza boomrat. [PAWN_pronoun] sau đó được giao dịch cho các thuộc địa Zeglar, nơi anh ta làm gái mại dâm.\n\n trong một sự kiện sán, [PAWN_pronoun] đã tìm cách gia nhập đoàn nô lệ trốn thoát khác khi họ cướp tàu. Sau khi chiến đấu với thuyền trưởng của phi hành đoàn nô lệ trên miếng pizza boomrat cuối cùng, [PAWN_nameDef] đã được gửi ra khỏi tàu trong một chiếc kén thoát hiểm.

GlitterworldEmpath26.title: Glitterworld empath
GlitterworldEmpath26.desc: NAME had an amazing ability to relate to others and mediate conflict. HECAP was selected to train as an empath. The training intensified HIS natural abilities, but HE became unable to harm others.

GlitterworldKid85.title: Glitterworld kid
GlitterworldKid85.desc: The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. HECAP kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby. \n\nIn HIS teens, HE ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

GlitterworldNerd20.title: Glitterworld nerd
GlitterworldNerd20.desc: NAME loved technology from the day HE was born. HECAP had a mechanoid companion which HE tried to modify when HE was 10.\n\nHISCAP obsession with technology meant that HE never appreciated arts or culture.

GlitterworldOfficer60.title: Glitterworld officer
GlitterworldOfficer60.desc: Though glitterworlds are peaceful places, they often remain prepared for war. NAME's unit rarely saw any real action.\n\nThough HE pursued HIS artistic hobbies, HIS subordinates preferred to entertain themselves by brawling, so NAME got good at breaking up fights.

GlitterworldRoyal24.title: Glitterworld royal
GlitterworldRoyal24.desc: NAME grew up in a glitterworld royal household. She was groomed from a young age to marry into another planet's royal family.\n\nUnfortunately, her crooked teeth made her undesirable to suitors, so she became bitter and resentful.

GlitterworldSurgeon15.title: Glitterworld surgeon
GlitterworldSurgeon15.desc: NAME worked as a surgeon on a world mostly free of disease and human suffering.\n\nHISCAP job mostly involved elaborate and creative cosmetic surgeries. HECAP has a good understanding of human biology, but never had to remove a cancer — or a bullet.

Gnomebiologist96.title: Gnomebiologist
Gnomebiologist96.desc: Gizmo was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. He went to conferences and managed an art gallery.\n\nHowever, he never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be his true profession.

GNomeSculptor34.title: G-nome sculptor
GNomeSculptor34.desc: NAME was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. He was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology.\n\nThe G-nome scientists nicknamed him Gizmo and occupied him with sculpting. He developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

GovernmentAgent47.title: Government agent
GovernmentAgent47.desc: NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.\n\nHaving grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

GraphicDesigner33.title: Graphic designer
GraphicDesigner33.desc: Kees' interest in artistic expression led him to become a designer. His eye for detail made him a reasonably well-known artist on his planet, though his meticulousness often led him to spend too much time perfecting a single project.

Guardian55.title: người giám hộ
Guardian55.desc: Sau khi [PAWN_pronoun] biết được điều gì thực sự quan trọng trong cuộc sống, [PAWN_nameDef] đã thay đổi để tốt hơn. [PAWN_pronoun] đã học cách làm việc chăm chỉ và bảo vệ những thứ quan trọng - không phải tiền hay vật chất, mà là bạn bè và những người thân yêu.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã trở thành một người giám hộ chuyên nghiệp.

GunDealer14.title: Đại lý súng
GunDealer14.desc: NAME đã trao đổi vũ khí công nghệ cao giữa các phe phái chiến tranh.\n\nTheo thời gian, HE trở nên rất thành thạo trong việc thực hiện các cuộc trình diễn sản phẩm và đàm phán các thỏa thuận có lợi nhuận.

Gunfighter51.title: tay súng
Gunfighter51.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một phát súng chết người. Hòa bình không dành cho anh. [PAWN_pronoun] đã tìm thấy gia đình của [PAWN_possessive] nơi có các anh chị em kết nghĩa mà [PAWN_pronoun] đã nhiều năm chiến đấu bên nhau.\n\nSau khi hầu hết những người thân cận với [PAWN_objective] đã chết, [PAWN_pronoun] một lần nữa lại lên đường tìm những người cần mượn súng của [PAWN_possessive] hoặc những người có thể trả tiền để sử dụng nó.

GunKid30.title: Gun kid
GunKid30.desc: Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.\n\nIn the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

Gymnast48.title: huấn luyện viên
Gymnast48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một vận động viên thể dục chuyên nghiệp từ khi còn nhỏ. Nhờ kỹ năng của mình, cô đã có thể rời khỏi quê nhà và đăng ký vào một trường đại học danh tiếng.\n\nVì không có cơ hội khởi nghiệp trong thể dục dụng cụ, cô đã rời trường đại học sau đó thất nghiệp và mang một khoản nợ khổng lồ.

HackerKid98.title: Hacker kid
HackerKid98.desc: Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age. \n\nSpending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

HackerProdigy84.title: Hacker prodigy
HackerProdigy84.desc: Wedge was raised as the only child of wealthy surgeons. After being pressured into accepting a medical apprenticeship, he snapped. He seized his inheritance and went underground to learn how to exploit computer networks. He quickly became one of the most feared hackers on his home planet.

HeadjackAddict4.title: Headjack addict
HeadjackAddict4.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

Healer0.title: thầy thuốc
Healer0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã dành thời gian để chiêm ngưỡng vẻ đẹp của thế giới.\n\nThỉnh thoảng sự hung hăng thụ động của cô nổi lên, nhưng cô đã cố gắng thích nghi với cuộc sống luôn đổi thay của mình.

HedgeFundManager54.title: Hedge fund manager
HedgeFundManager54.desc: A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.\n\nAs he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

HelpDeskWorker31.title: nhân viên giúp việc
HelpDeskWorker31.desc: Do sự yêu thích công nghệ [PAWN_possessive] và mong muốn giúp đỡ người khác, [PAWN_nameDef] đã nhảy vào cơ hội nhận công việc tại bàn trợ giúp.\n\nThật không may, hậu quả nghiền nát linh hồn của công việc kéo dài hơn nhiệt tình [PAWN_possessive].

Herbalist54.title: Herbalist
Herbalist54.desc: NAME lived in the forest near a village. Though many of the villagers feared HIM, sick villagers would come to HIM to purchase salves and poultices made from the herbs HE grew in HIS garden. HECAP was happy to help them — for a price.

Herder19.title: Herder
Herder19.desc: As a child, NAME tended the tribe’s muffalo herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating the sick. It was quiet work, but HE enjoyed being away from people.

Hermit82.title: Hermit
Hermit82.desc: Worn out by the pressures of social interaction, NAME left HIS crowded midworld city to live a simple life in the wilderness. There, HE spent HIS days alone, tending HIS garden and crafting the simple tools HE needed to survive.

Herpetologist3.title: Herpetologist
Herpetologist3.desc: After a terrible mining accident, NAME set off into space in search of exotic new animal species.\n\nHECAP hoped to leave HIS past behind and find long-lived companions. HECAP knew the pain of loss too well.

HexCellArtist91.title: Hex-cell artist
HexCellArtist91.desc: NAME crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.\n\nAfter HIS popularity grew, HE was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept HIM prisoner and forced HIM to create sculptures for sale.

HighBaroness37.title: High baroness
HighBaroness37.desc: NAME was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.\n\nShe was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

HillbillyProdigy60.title: Hillbilly prodigy
HillbillyProdigy60.desc: Born on a cold hillbilly planet inhabited mainly by furred xenohumans, Benjamin grew up to the sound of bar fights and shootouts. Though his childhood was spent playing the banjo and working as a mechanic, his abnormal intelligence made him want something more; he entered medical school at age twenty.

HiredAssassin37.title: Hired assassin
HiredAssassin37.desc: Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

HiredGun70.title: Hired gun
HiredGun70.desc: NAME always wanted to prove HE could make a living without HIS parents' help. HECAP did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.\n\nHe eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

HiredMuscle5.title: cơ bắp làm thuê
HiredMuscle5.desc: Hiểu biết cuộc sống trên đường phố thực sự như thế nào, [PAWN_nameDef] rơi vào cảnh sát. Tuy nhiên, một trường hợp đặc biệt đáng lo ngại đã kết thúc với việc anh ta đánh chết hung thủ.\n\nĐược giải thoát khỏi nhiệm vụ của mình, anh ta đã sử dụng các liên hệ và kỹ năng của mình để tìm việc làm thuê cho một kẻ côn đồ.

HistoryStudent78.title: History student
