HistoryStudent78.desc: As a child, NAME spent learned many artistic forms including music and novel writing. As HE grew older, HE began to study legends from HIS home world - legends of the lizard-like beings at the center of HIS culture's folklore.

Housemate8.title: Housemate
Housemate8.desc: As an adult, NAME kept house and cared for children while HIS spouse worked.

HouseServant86.title: House servant
HouseServant86.desc: Early in HIS adulthood, NAME was kidnapped and sold to wealthy aristocrats as a domestic servant.\n\nHECAP got to know the kitchens and basements of HIS master's mansion well, but never did any work outside.

HumanComputer83.title: Human computer
HumanComputer83.desc: NAME turned out to have an excellent memory and a gift for performing complex calculations in HIS head. A midworld dictator decided to employ NAME to keep track of HIS state's finances and expenditure, since electrical computers were too susceptible to hacking.

HumanTrafficker35.title: Human trafficker
HumanTrafficker35.desc: NAME stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers.\n\nOver time, he lost what little moral sense he had left.

Hunter74.title: Hunter
Hunter74.desc: Hawke was a master hunter.\n\nHe learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

HunterOfTheKing53.title: Hunter of the king
HunterOfTheKing53.desc: NAME was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.\n\nDespite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found him.

HunterScavenger64.title: thợ săn cướp bóc
HunterScavenger64.desc: Sinh ra trong một gia đình trộm cướp ở vùng đất bùn của Vinna, [PAWN_nameDef] sống sót nhờ cướp bóc thực phẩm và tài nguyên từ các khu định cư gần đó cùng với băng đảng của [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] là người hung tợn nhất trong nhóm.

IcePlanetChild95.title: Ice planet child
IcePlanetChild95.desc: Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, NAME only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.\n\nThe lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

IceworldSurvivor75.title: Iceworld survivor
IceworldSurvivor75.desc: NAME was born on an iceworld. Survival depended on staying together and building with nothing.\n\nHECAP got used to the cold. HECAP never got used to dealing with those strange green things called plants.

IdealisticCadet64.title: Idealistic cadet
IdealisticCadet64.desc: Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, NAME was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.\n\nHe excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

IllegalShipwright76.title: Illegal shipwright
IllegalShipwright76.desc: There is a law that says that you're not allowed to put terawatt-range grasers on a cargo scow. Especially if you hide them under what looks like a communications dish for better ambush potential. NAME discovered that there is great profit to be made, however, from those who are uninterested in these laws.

ImperialGeneral27.title: Imperial general
ImperialGeneral27.desc: NAME's thirst for power defined HIM. HECAP quickly rose through the military ranks and soon attained the rank of general.\n\nHECAP was given with the most challenging task - conquering distant and unexplored rim worlds. Victory here could even position HIM as a successor to the emperor.

ImperialStudent49.title: Imperial student
ImperialStudent49.desc: NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

IndustrialOrphan13.title: Industrial orphan
IndustrialOrphan13.desc: NAME never knew HIS parents. HISCAP earliest memories were of drudgery in the mines and workhouses of HIS industrial world.\n\nBecause of this, HE never received a proper education.

IndworldUrchin73.title: Indworld urchin
IndworldUrchin73.desc: NAME grew up on the streets of a world in the early stages of its industrial revolution. HECAP passed HIS days stealing, begging and tinkering with discarded machine scraps, always on the lookout for a way to escape poverty.

Infantry99.title: Infantry
Infantry99.desc: Lenka was raised on a world wracked by war.\n\nAt an early age, she was shown how to use guns and cruelty to project her will. She later distinguished herself by committing atrocities with more enthusiasm than anyone else.

InformationBroker77.title: Information broker
InformationBroker77.desc: NAME caught a ship to the next star system and began a life of travel and learning, quickly collecting a massive bank of knowledge from people of all shapes and sizes.\n\nHECAP learned to sell this knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

IntelligenceAgent21.title: Intelligence agent
IntelligenceAgent21.desc: Because of his hacking skills, Wedge was recruited by his home planet's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained him in combat, but he prefers psychological warfare.\n\nGovernment rules proved too strict for him, so he went rogue. His current activities are unknown.

IntimateAssassin35.title: sát thủ thân mật
IntimateAssassin35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một sát thủ chuyên nghiệp. Cô ấy tàn bạo, tính toán và tỏ ra hoàn toàn vô hại.\n\nCô thích sử dụng các cử chỉ thân mật để thanh toán mục tiêu của mình. Điều này đáp ứng cả hợp đồng và mong muốn kiểm soát bản thân của cô ấy.

Inventor6.title: Inventor
Inventor6.desc: On HIS homeworld, NAME worked as a moderately successful inventor. HECAP developed several minor technologies.

InvoluntaryHermit24.title: Involuntary hermit
InvoluntaryHermit24.desc: NAME’s escape pod was jettisoned onto an unexplored region of a frontier world. She eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company.\n \nLater, she was spotted clad in pygmy wombat furs, discussing the importance of hoof hygiene with a group of elderly muffalo.

Jailbird40.title: Jailbird
Jailbird40.desc: NAME spent most of HIS life in prisons, where HE was put to work in the kitchens. HECAP had a habit of getting into fights, and developed an aggressive way of speaking.

JoywireAddict76.title: Joywire addict
JoywireAddict76.desc: NAME's wealthy parents provided everything HE ever wanted. After discovering joywires, HE became obsessed. Once HIS parents realized what happened, they cut HIM off.\n\nUncaring and often violent, HE sought HIS next joywire fix by any means possible.

JoywireArtist8.title: Joywire artist
JoywireArtist8.desc: NAME worked in an urbworld lab developing cutting-edge joywire software to maximize user pleasure.\n\nWhen the local government imposed harsh restrictions on joywire manufacturing, HE began selling HIS products on the black market.

JungleKid31.title: Jungle kid
JungleKid31.desc: NAME was abandoned as a newborn, and grew up among the animals of HIS homeworld’s dense jungles.\n\nWhen HE was a teenager, a traveling doctor found HIM injured near a road, hissing and meowing. He rescued HIM and took HIM on as an apprentice.

JunkyardMechanic51.title: Junkyard mechanic
JunkyardMechanic51.desc: Left for dead at a young age, NAME was rescued by an old man who ran an urbworld junkyard. The old man forced NAME to do dangerous, demanding work. \n\nNAME became very familiar with machines, but HE grew up with almost no other experiences.

KidScientist53.title: Kid scientist
KidScientist53.desc: Born into an influential family, NAME received the best education money could buy. Her intellect soon proved to be superior to many. However, her lack of empathy quickly put her at odds with her teachers and her parents.

Killer41.title: Killer
Killer41.desc: NAME was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought her the product of a snake demon and human coupling.\n\nAfter watching how her human father betrayed and murdered her mother, she longed to see how many more humans she could get to fall into her hands.

KingOfPirates25.title: vua cướp biển
KingOfPirates25.desc: Là một vị vua hải tặc tự xưng, [PAWN_nameDef] rất tàn nhẫn. Với bản chất gian manh xảo trá, [PAWN_pronoun] không ngại hy sinh những người xung quanh [PAWN_objective] để đạt được mục đích của [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] là một xạ thủ, thậm chí dùng kiếm còn giỏi hơn, và [PAWN_pronoun] yêu thích sự áp đảo adrenaline trong các trận cận chiến.

LabGrownChild22.title: Lab-grown child
LabGrownChild22.desc: NAME was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human.\n\nHISCAP childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. He was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

LaborCampOrphan91.title: Labor camp orphan
LaborCampOrphan91.desc: NAME lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

LanguageAnalyst27.title: Language analyst
LanguageAnalyst27.desc: After war broke out on HIS homeworld, NAME was conscripted as a linguist. HECAP spent HIS days in a space station, decoding enemy communications and tending the hydroponic crops.\n\nAfter a meteorite damaged the station, HE was forced to enter cryptosleep and hope for rescue.

LazyProgrammer3.title: Lazy programmer
LazyProgrammer3.desc: NAME independently developed software that had a competitive edge against local urbworld corporations.\n\nHISCAP legally questionable methods lead to a growing number in unsolved claims of intellectual property theft.

LogicalChild2.title: Đứa trẻ logical
LogicalChild2.desc: [PAWN_pronoun] ưa thích các hoạt động logic như máy tính và hoàn toàn vô dụng trong nghệ thuật.\n\nLúng túng trong các tình huống xã hội, bạn bè của [sở hữu PAWN] rất ít nhưng thân thiết.

Loner61.title: Loner
Loner61.desc: Loner never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. HECAP prefers the open plain and the lonely whistle of wind through the rocks.\n\nHECAP visits HIS tribe from time to time, but for the most part HE takes care of HIMself using HIS own survival skills.

LoneTraveler95.title: Lone traveler
LoneTraveler95.desc: After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.\n\nHECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

LoreKeeper51.title: Lore keeper
LoreKeeper51.desc: NAME was one of a long line of lore keepers in HIS tribe. Every night around the fire, HECAP would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

LostMarine81.title: Lost marine
LostMarine81.desc: Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, NAME disappeared without a trace.\n\nLater, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

LostSoldier13.title: Lost soldier
LostSoldier13.desc: NAME's childhood soldier conditioning failed, and the experiment was shut down. HECAP was abandoned, purposeless, friendless.\n\nNAME eventually found solace in physically demanding work. HECAP especially liked building houses and crafting heavy armor.

LowWageWorker7.title: Low-wage worker
LowWageWorker7.desc: NAME worked a variety of casual jobs to support HIS family, gaining a set of basic hands-on skills.

MachineCollector55.title: Machine collector
MachineCollector55.desc: NAME was obsessed with old machines and arcane pieces of technology. HECAP obtained them wherever HE could, and loved taking them apart to see how they worked.\n\nHE had a habit of talking about HIS collection long after people around HIM had stopped listening.

MachineFixer31.title: Machine fixer
MachineFixer31.desc: NAME was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen.\n\nAfter a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, HE learned how to patch HIMself up pretty well. Despite the pain, HE never learned to dislike fire.

MadAccountant61.title: Mad accountant
MadAccountant61.desc: As an accountant, NAME often socialized with colleagues, and made many friends in upper management.\n\nOne day, NAME discovered a corruption racket run by some of HIS bosses. After reporting this, HE was fired. Wishing to hunt down those responsible, HE went on a mass murder spree.

MadScientist0.title: nhà khoa học điên
MadScientist0.desc: Sau khi học xong, [PAWN_nameDef] được thuê bởi nhà nghiên cứu di truyền hàng đầu hành tinh. Sau đó, cô bị bắt gặp khi đang thực hiện một thử nghiệm bất hợp pháp, vô nhân đạo.\n\nBất chấp ảnh hưởng từ gia đình của cô ấy, cô đã bị kết án và bị kết án lao động khổ sai trong một thuộc địa ngục tù.

MafiaBoss17.title: Mafia boss
MafiaBoss17.desc: NAME was a high-ranking member of an urbworld crime syndicate.\n\nHECAP bribed officials, maintained the loyalty of HIS subordinates, and extracted overdue payments - by any means necessary.

MarbleDoctor99.title: Marble doctor
MarbleDoctor99.desc: On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid.\n\nNAME used his medical skills to help the injured and the sick. HECAP believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

MarineCadet73.title: Marine cadet
MarineCadet73.desc: NAME was in a planetary marine cadet program.\n\nHECAP was kicked out for shooting an officer. It was never established whether this was an accident.

MasterChef48.title: Master chef
MasterChef48.desc: On a glitterworld, NAME found a job washing dishes at a famous restaurant and worked HIS way up the ranks.\n\nA few years later, HIS career came to an end when someone poisoned the meal HE was preparing for the mayor. Jobless, HE and left to explore the stars once again.

MasterTrader65.title: Master trader
MasterTrader65.desc: NAME was a master at trading. HECAP earned his nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

Mathematician6.title: Mathematician
Mathematician6.desc: NAME did mathematical research at a university.\n\nHECAP spent much of HIS spare time immersed in shooting simulations, though HE was frequently ridiculed by other players for HIS terrible aim.

MechanicsEngineer64.title: Mechanics engineer
MechanicsEngineer64.desc: NAME loved solving problems and, with HIS steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. HECAP built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes.\n\nEventually, HE was able to pick and choose HIS corporate clients. HECAP made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

MechanoidHacker93.title: Mechanoid hacker
MechanoidHacker93.desc: The only son of a well respected mechanoid inventor, NAME had access to the materials to subvert and modify HISCAP father's creations.\n\nHECAP used drugs to increase HIS productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited HIS social life.

MechanoidNerd10.title: Mechanoid nerd
MechanoidNerd10.desc:
NAME grew up in an urbworld as the only child of a pair of mechanoid designers.
They encouraged HIS interest in the machines. Eventually, HE became obsessed with building HIS own.

Unfortunately this also lead to HIM being a loner as HE prefered technical books to friends.

MechWarVeteran77.title: Mech war veteran
MechWarVeteran77.desc: NAME fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. HECAP has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

MedicalAssistant12.title: Medical assistant
MedicalAssistant12.desc: NAME was born during a catastrophic war in which both sides used napalm extensively. HECAP grew up helping HIS parents in an infirmary, treating the cascade of horrific burns from the battlefields. HECAP was left with a lifelong fear of fire.

MedicalHelper27.title: Medical helper
MedicalHelper27.desc: NAME traveled between rim worlds with HIS family. NAME's mother, a renowned doctor, often delivered lectures from the hull of their retrofitted cargo/medical ship.\n\nSometimes, the family took on difficult long-term medical work with especially needy patients, and NAME helped where he could.

MedicalScientist16.title: Medical scientist
MedicalScientist16.desc: Benjamin enlisted as a doctor on a passing science vessel. Roaming the stars with a large crew of xenohumans and transbirds, he did genetic research on encountered species. He developed a deep friendship with one transbird but was forced to leave the ship when the captain dismissed all non-avians.

MedicalStudent38.title: sinh viên y khoa
MedicalStudent38.desc: Sinh ra trong một hàng dài các bác sĩ, [PAWN_nameDef] được dạy kèm trong tất cả các lĩnh vực y học, từ thuốc mỡ thảo dược đến các loại thuốc tổng hợp hiện đại. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng nhận được sự khinh miệt lành mạnh đối với công việc của tầng lớp thấp hơn.

MedicalStudent96.title: sinh viên y khoa
MedicalStudent96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một thế giới lung linh trong một gia đình bác sĩ và chọn duy trì truyền thống.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] có ít bạn bè, nhưng rất thân với anh chị em [PAWN_possessive].

MedicSoldier54.title: Medic soldier
MedicSoldier54.desc: NAME enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.\n\nHECAP left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

MedievalDoctor40.title: Medieval doctor
MedievalDoctor40.desc: NAME worked as a doctor on a medieval planet. HECAP firmly believes that most ailments can be cured with a little bloodletting.\n\nHECAP was also a master anaesthetist, developing a specialty technique that involved a heavy blow to the head.

MedievalFarmOaf58.title: Trang trại Oaf thời trung cổ
MedievalFarmOaf58.desc: Chặt, cuốc, xe bò dẫn đường, đẩy xe cút kít. Đào mương, gieo hạt, dự đoán thu hoạch.\n\nNông dân thời trung cổ không được giáo dục theo nghĩa thông thường, nhưng họ biết rất nhiều về việc trồng cây mà không có công nghệ. Điều đó nói rằng, một cuộc sống như vậy khiến người ta không thể tham gia vào các hoạt động trí tuệ, công nghệ.

MedievalKnight26.title: Medieval knight
MedievalKnight26.desc: William fought for king and country on the battlefield, where he further honed his skill as a swordsman. His greatest glory was leading a charge into an enemy courtroom and capturing the king at sword point.

MedievalLord57.title: Medieval lord
MedievalLord57.desc: NAME was a lord on a preindustrial planet. HECAP went to parties, managed the underlings, and even learned some swordplay.\n\nHISCAP soft hands did not hold a work tool during that entire time. HECAP considers manual labor to be beneath HIM.

MedievalLordling19.title: Medieval lordling
MedievalLordling19.desc: NAME was a minor noble in an old kingdom on a medieval world. HECAP grew up in a manor made of stone, served by bowing lowerclassmen.\n\nSuch a life teaches no technical skills and instils a lifelong aversion to manual labor - but NAME learned early the ways of social manipulation.

MedievalMinstrel95.title: Medieval minstrel
MedievalMinstrel95.desc: NAME was a traveling entertainer on a medieval world.\n\nHECAP could always be found telling stories or singing songs, and is capable of protecting HIMself from the dangers of the road. However, HECAP was always conspicuously absent whenever there was hard labour to be done.

MedievalPlower14.title: Medieval plower
MedievalPlower14.desc: NAME lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. HISCAP family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced. This left NAME's family poor, and unable to pay for HIS education. Instead, HE was required to work the fields with HIS parents, and never had time to practice creativity.

MedievalSlave49.title: Medieval slave
MedievalSlave49.desc: NAME grew up pulling carts and digging holes on a medieval world. Simple manual labor is HIS oldest companion - along with the master's lash.\n\nHECAP didn't learn to read until age nine.

MedievalSquire5.title: Medieval squire
MedievalSquire5.desc: William grew up on a medieval planet as a knight in training. He trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of his youth, and learned to fight with a sword and shield.

MedievalThief74.title: Medieval thief
MedievalThief74.desc: NAME grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for himself.\n\nAt first, he only took what he needed. Then he learned to take what he wanted.

MentalPatient69.title: Mental patient
MentalPatient69.desc: NAME was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, HE spent HIS time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum.\n\nHECAP was eventually released, but HE retained HIS emotional distance, HIS curiosity about human anatomy, and HIS namesake manic giggling.

Mercenary55.title: Mercenary
Mercenary55.desc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

MercenaryChef31.title: Mercenary chef
MercenaryChef31.desc: Following in his family's footsteps, NAME was a soldier for hire.\n\nHe is a naturally gifted sharpshooter. However, his real passion is in perfecting a new recipe or dissecting a new gadget.

MercenaryLeader28.title: Mercenary leader
MercenaryLeader28.desc: Alone, NAME set out to rebuild HIS father's life's work. HECAP challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.\n\nHISCAP men mutinied. HECAP was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

MercenaryLord13.title: Trùm đánh thuê
MercenaryLord13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã thành lập một công ty lính đánh thuê từ những người làm việc tự do muốn kiếm nhiều tiền mà không phải làm những việc quá thất đức. [PAWN_pronoun] gọi nó là Ashmarines (những quân nhân tro bụi).\n\ nĐể tránh các lực lượng quân sự của trung tâm thế thới, [PAWN_pronoun] đã chuyển công ty của mình sang RimWorlds. Ở đó, [PAWN_pronoun] thành lập các căn cứ và cộng đồng. Để cai trị, [PAWN_pronoun] duy trì trật tự giữa những kẻ cướp và những kẻ điên trong không gian sâu thẳm.

MercenaryPilot63.title: Mercenary pilot
MercenaryPilot63.desc: NAME convinced his squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.\n\nHis men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

MercenaryRecruit18.title: chiêu mộ lính đánh thuê
MercenaryRecruit18.desc: Sinh ra trong một hàng dài lính đánh thuê ngoài thế giới, [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một trung tâm giao dịch bận rộn. Khi còn trẻ, [PAWN_pronoun] đã được tuyển dụng vào một trong những đội lính đánh thuê.

MercenaryRecruit64.title: chiêu mộ lính đánh thuê
MercenaryRecruit64.desc: Xuất thân từ một hàng dài lính đánh thuê ngoài thế giới, [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một trung tâm giao dịch bận rộn.\n\nSự quan tâm của [PAWN_possessive] đối với hàng hóa nước ngoài tại chợ thường khiến anh ta mất tập trung vào công việc và đào tạo.

MessageCarrier77.title: Message carrier
MessageCarrier77.desc: On a medieval world, the fastest way to send a message is to give it to somebody on a horse and hope they survive the journey. NAME was that somebody.

Microbiologist12.title: Microbiologist
Microbiologist12.desc: A plague struck NAME's native urbworld. NAME and other researchers revealed that the illness was a bioweapon, but the people turned on them, blaming them for the sickness.\n\nNAME barely escaped his homeworld as it fell into chaos.

MidworldCadet83.title: Midworld cadet
MidworldCadet83.desc: Growing up on a high-tech midworld with a flourishing space transit industry, NAME wished to leave for the stars and live among the growing spacer class.\n\nHECAP excelled in HIS studies, and gained entry to HIS homeworld's most prestigious naval academy.

MidworldGeek18.title: Midworld geek
MidworldGeek18.desc: NAME grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. He was never a master of social interaction, but his interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

MidworldLoner80.title: Cô đơn giữa thế giới
MidworldLoner80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] được sinh ra trên một thế giới trung bình hòa bình, không quan trọng.\n\nTrong khi [PAWN_pronoun] có một vài người bạn, [PAWN_pronoun] thích dành thời gian [PAWN_possessive] trong sự cô độc, tự mày mò trên [PAWN_possessive] khi nghe trên mạng hoặc liếc vào những người lính nhựa với một khẩu súng trường mới mà [PAWN_pronoun] vừa được đặt cùng nhau.

MidworldSailor91.title: Midworld sailor
MidworldSailor91.desc: NAME joined his country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, he eventually cracked and used the skills he had acquired to start a mutiny on his ship.\n\nIn the end, NAME was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. He henceforth always had chefs to cook for him.

MidworldSketcher71.title: Midworld sketcher
MidworldSketcher71.desc: NAME was born into a loving but poor family.\n\nHECAP discovered he had an artistic talent which he inherited from his father. HISCAP mother taught him the benefits of hard work and determination. As he grew older, NAME developed a fascination with technology and military history.

MilitantChild49.title: Militant child
MilitantChild49.desc: NAME's military family forced him to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics.\n\nIn his own time, he built small inventions. This sharpened his mind.

MilitaryCadet16.title: sĩ quan quân đội
MilitaryCadet16.desc: Mồ côi khi còn nhỏ, [PAWN_nameDef] được gửi đến một trường quân sự bí mật trong một thế giới chết chóc khắc nghiệt.\n\nNhanh chóng sử dụng súng và huấn luyện sinh tồn, [PAWN_pronoun] tốt nghiệp danh dự, chuyển sang vị trí lãnh đạo trong các hoạt động bí mật.

MilitaryChild82.title: Military child
MilitaryChild82.desc: NAME grew up in a family with a rich military background. HISCAP teenage years were spent traveling system to system wherever HIS parents were deployed.\n\nFollowing the tradition of HIS family, HE enlisted at the earliest possible age.

MilitaryCommissar71.title: Military commissar
MilitaryCommissar71.desc: NAME was an internal spymaster in an Imperial army battalion. HECAP made sure that the men were loyal, and did not fall back unless ordered. This made HIM unpopular, but HE gained great skill at detecting the slightest dishonesty.

MilitaryEngineer45.title: Military engineer
MilitaryEngineer45.desc: NAME worked as an engineer for a colonial military. HECAP got to play with weapons, murder-drones, and other 'fun' stuff.\n\nHECAP specialized in repairing and modifying mechanoids' tools. Sometimes HE tested them HIMself.

MilitaryGunsmith27.title: Tay súng quân sự
MilitaryGunsmith27.desc: Khi thế giới của [PAWN_possessive] bị xung đột, [PAWN_nameDef] đã được đưa đi cùng với nhiều đồng đội của [PAWN_possessive] vào cỗ máy chiến tranh để xé toạc hành tinh.\n\nVới chuyên môn đặc biệt của [PAWN_possessive], [PAWN_pronoun] đã đủ may mắn để tìm được một vị trí phục vụ như một thợ cơ khí vũ khí nhỏ hơn là ở tuyến đầu.

MilitaryInventor35.title: Military inventor
MilitaryInventor35.desc: Jackson, in a final act of rebellion, left his father's lab and joined the local Imperial military.\n\nHe used his laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this he was one of the best on his planet.

MilitaryOfficer17.title: Military officer
MilitaryOfficer17.desc: Obsessed with interstellar travel, NAME left HIS desolate life behind to join a military academy in hopes of becoming a pilot.\n\nHECAP was trained in advanced combat and survival skills. While HE excelled in HIS studies, NAME was a loner and never cared about HIS crewmates.

MilitaryRecruit49.title: Military recruit
MilitaryRecruit49.desc: NAME was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship.\n\nFrom a young age, HE was trained to be a good soldier. They taught him how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

MilitaryTrainee20.title: Military trainee
MilitaryTrainee20.desc: NAME was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. HECAP was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. HECAP also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

MilitiaSoldier79.title: Militia soldier
MilitiaSoldier79.desc: NAME joined the militia forces and fought for rights and peace.\n\nAfter her homeworld was unexpectedly destroyed in the wars, she traveled great distances, seeking a refuge where she could build a new, free way of life.

MindwipedAssassin50.title: Mindwiped assassin
MindwipedAssassin50.desc: The corporation took and remade NAME. They trained HIM into an tool of destruction and subversion. HE took to HIS new life, finding satisfaction in the jobs they sent HIM on.\n\nWhen HE learned that they planned on disposing of HIM, NAME turned on his masters, killing several and fleeing the planet.

Minister88.title: Minister
Minister88.desc: NAME managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. HECAP got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep HIS citizens content. HECAP had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though HE never forgot how to do hard work.

Missionary99.title: Missionary
Missionary99.desc: NAME decided to devote HIS life to religious service. HE made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

MobHenchman53.title: Mob henchman
MobHenchman53.desc: After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, NAME was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

Model99.title: Model
Model99.desc: NAME modelled clothes and jewellery for advertisers, and was also used as a physical blueprint for characters in virtual reality simulations.

MuffaloResearcher67.title: nhà nghiên cứu muffalo
MuffaloResearcher67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] chuyên nghiên cứu và thao tác mã di truyền của muffalo.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] làm việc ít để dành sự đánh giá cao cho nghệ thuật hoặc công ty của người khác.

MuffaloShaman95.title: Muffalo shaman
MuffaloShaman95.desc: Because of HIS quiet wisdom and great strength, NAME became the spiritual leader for a nomadic tribe that followed the herds of roaming muffalo.

MusicIdol50.title: Music idol
MusicIdol50.desc: NAME was the only daughter of a powerful company president. HISCAP beautiful appearance led to a career as a music idol.\n\nWhen HIS mother died, NAME could not bear HIS father's loneliness, and became his sexual companion.

Mute34.title: Mute
Mute34.desc: NAME was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in HIS life. For many years HE refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with HIS household's numerous pets.

MutinousCaptain52.title: Mutinous captain
MutinousCaptain52.desc: NAME was taken to the stars by slavers after HIS tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years HE learned the language of HIS captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat.\n\nThe captain only learned of NAME's true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

Naturalist14.title: Naturalist
Naturalist14.desc: Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.\n\nHISCAP family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

NavyPathfinder53.title: Hoa tiêu hải quân
NavyPathfinder53.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] được nuôi dưỡng và huấn luyện bởi một nhóm các nhà thám hiểm quân sự chuyên về bản đồ đường đi xuyên không gian sâu thẳm và trên các hành tinh xa xôi.

NavyScientist52.title: Navy scientist
NavyScientist52.desc: Interstellar warfare is won by technology, so imperial navies are always on the peak of modern research. Even better, they have first access to Transcendent artifacts because they find them in space.\n\nNAME worked in a navy lab.

NavyTechOfficer0.title: sĩ quan công nghệ hải quân
NavyTechOfficer0.desc: Sau khi sửa chữa hoàn thiện màn hình của hạm đội chỉ với một cặp kìm gỉ và dây phế liệu, [PAWN_nameDef] đã được mời đến Học viện Hải quân Liên bang.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã được giáo dục kỹ thuật tuyệt vời và huấn luyện vũ khí mở rộng, nhưng không hứng thú nghiên cứu các kỹ năng hậu cần.

Nerd92.title: Nerd
Nerd92.desc: NAME was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of their industrial city, NAME read every book he could find about technology, robots, and weapons - whatever looked coolest.\n\nHis strong French accent kept him from making real friends.

NetworkEngineer34.title: Kỹ sự mạng
NetworkEngineer34.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã dành tất cả thời gian [PAWN_pronoun] làm việc trên các hệ thống mạng máy tính.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] sống mà không cần quan tâm trên thế giới - ngoại trừ các gói thời gian hoạt động và bị rơi.

NeuroScientist19.title: Neuro scientist
NeuroScientist19.desc: Kevin worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain.\n\nAfter succeeding in mapping the whole brain, Kevin joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

NewAgeDuelist27.title: New age duelist
NewAgeDuelist27.desc: NAME was fascinated with combat. HIS parents traveled often, so HE was able to sample many different fighting styles, from 76th-wave jujutsu to the infamous 'urbworld-style' karate.\n\nA polite child, most fighters accepted HIS requests for training - but moving around often without finishing a tutelage made HIM lazy.

NinjaAssassin31.title: Ninja assassin
NinjaAssassin31.desc: NAME performed stiletto-precise assassinations for an interplanetary conglomerate. HECAP was assigned the most complex missions involving disguise, deception, subterfuge, and efficient violence.\n\nA nasty incident with a potted plant and an assassination gone wrong left HIM with an aversion to plant life.

NobleWard61.title: Noble ward
NobleWard61.desc: NAME was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by HIS mother.\n\nHECAP quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond her own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

Novelist7.title: Novelist
Novelist7.desc: NAME lived on a glitterworld, penning wildly successful novels. HECAP lived a carefree lifestyle, spending HIS days writing and HIS nights partying...and never did a day's manual labour in HIS life.

Nurse61.title: Nurse
Nurse61.desc: NAME worked in an industrial-era hospital, doing routine work such as changing bandages and taking temperatures.\n\nIt was a busy job, but HE could always find time for a chat with a patient.

OfficerCadet25.title: Officer cadet
OfficerCadet25.desc: From a young age, Bashkire trained to be a leader of men. He enrolled in the Vanu Defense College when he was a boy and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.

OffworldRecruit91.title: Offworld recruit
OffworldRecruit91.desc: NAME was born an raised in an offworld soldier growth facility. From a very young age, HE was taught close-quarters combat tactics, aggression, and how to survive on distant planets.\n\nOne of the best, NAME was eventually chose to enter the orbital-deployment shock troop corps.

OptimisticChild30.title: Optimistic child
OptimisticChild30.desc: Kees was blessed with loving parents and a pleasant midworld life. He was an optimistic and sociable kid who loved making friends and listening to their stories. His imagination would run wild with ideas and questions.

OrbitalReservist22.title: Orbital reservist
OrbitalReservist22.desc: When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, NAME was drafted and trained.\n\nHECAP was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

OrganFarm67.title: Organ farm
OrganFarm67.desc: NAME was raised in an illegal underground organ farm. HISCAP body was used to grow organic implants for wounded mercenaries. Though HIS upbringing has left HIM haunted, it has also given HIM a unique understanding of human biology.

Orphan11.title: mồ côi
Orphan11.desc: Sinh ra trong một nhà thổ trên một thế giới khắc nghiệt, [PAWN_nameDef] không bao giờ thực sự có một tuổi thơ. [PAWN_pronoun] đã làm những công việc kỳ lạ để tồn tại và trở nên xa cách với những người khác.

Orphan15.title: mồ côi
Orphan15.desc: Left alone in the world without parents, Kevin did the best he could to adapt.\n\nHaving to take care both of himself and younger kids at the orphanage, he learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

OrphanOfWar60.title: Mồ côi chiến tranh
OrphanOfWar60.desc: NAME lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.\n\nHECAP took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

Osteologist74.title: Osteologist
Osteologist74.desc: After graduating university at the top of his class, NAME quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor.\n\nWith his new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

OverwatchSniper42.title: Overwatch sniper
OverwatchSniper42.desc: NAME didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.\n\nArmy life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Pampered87.title: Pampered
Pampered87.desc: Born on a decadent glitterworld, NAME was given every expensive toy.\n\nThis pampered lifestyle caused HIM to miss many basic life lessons. HECAP developed a special aversion to cooking, and always ordered the staff to do the kitchen work.

Paramedic45.title: Paramedic
Paramedic45.desc: NAME's job was to respond rapidly to medical emergencies. HECAP is used to dealing with severe injuries with only limited medical supplies.\n\nHECAP treated so many gunshot wounds over the years that even seeing a gun made HIM uncomfortable.

ParamilitaryAgent11.title: Paramilitary agent
ParamilitaryAgent11.desc: After scraping by on assorted shady jobs, NAME joined with a large paramilitary group to fight a war on HIS homeworld. HISCAP role was infiltration and intelligence gathering

ParticlePhysicist44.title: Particle physicist
ParticlePhysicist44.desc: NAME performed cutting-edge physics research. She wanted to help build a better and more peaceful future.

PetKeeper7.title: Pet keeper
PetKeeper7.desc: NAME spent most of HIS childhood tending the animals HE had bought or rescued.\n\nHECAP saw beauty in natural things more than fabricated objects, and chose the company of HIS animals over that of HIS peers.

Philosopher82.title: Philosopher
Philosopher82.desc: NAME was a student on a glitterworld. HECAP had a hard time in school, since the other kids thought HIM rather strange.\n\nHECAP always maintained a distance from these events, being continuously surprised by the many interesting and awkward ways life can go.

Philosopher97.title: nhà triết học
Philosopher97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã khao khát về kiến thức công nghệ của kiến trúc sư [PAWN_objective] dành nhiều năm để khảo sát các trung tâm dữ liệu bị bỏ rơi và nghiên cứu các ngôn ngữ mã hóa cổ xưa.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] tự nhận là một trong số ít người có thể ghép lại bi kịch của quá khứ - và đưa ra một con đường dẫn đến tương lai.

Pickpocket82.title: người móc túi
Pickpocket82.desc: Mồ côi và bị bỏ rơi trên những con đường hỗn loạn ở quê nhà ô nhiễm, đầy ắp của mình, [PAWN_nameDef] sống sót nhờ bàn tay khéo léo và đôi chân mau lẹ. Một tên trộm và kẻ lừa đảo bẩm sinh, [PAWN_pronoun] đã nổi lên sớm, điều hành băng đảng nhím khét tiếng và hung bạo 'Doomben Rats'.

PilotFan16.title: Pilot fan
PilotFan16.desc: NAME's father was a starfighter pilot, and HE always idolized the old man.\n\nFrom a young age, HE collected pilot memorabilia and studied pilot books, preparing to join the deep space navy and follow in HIS father's footsteps.

Pirate56.title: Pirate
Pirate56.desc: As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. HECAP was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.\n\nHISCAP name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

PirateCaptain69.title: Pirate captain
PirateCaptain69.desc: NAME worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

PirateDoctor0.title: Pirate doctor
PirateDoctor0.desc: NAME had a passion for medicine, but never bothered to get a medical degree. Only underfunded pirates and terrorists were desperate enough to hire HIS services, and HIS surgical patients had about a 50% survival rate.\n\nDespite this, HIS optimistic attitude drove HIM to keep trying to heal those in need. As long as they paid up front.

PirateKing81.title: Pirate king
PirateKing81.desc: With no real care for other people, NAME fit in perfectly with the pirate crew that he had once been a captive of. Shortly after becoming one of the crew, NAME began to kill anyone or anything that got in his way—including his crew mates.

PirateSympathizer24.title: Pirate sympathizer
PirateSympathizer24.desc: From her youth, NAME developed connections in the underworld. There she trained in melee combat and became a trusted underworld advisor.\n\nAfter participating in a failed rebellion, she fled her homeworld to travel with a pirate band.

PirateTrooper73.title: Pirate trooper
PirateTrooper73.desc: NAME joined a renowned interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids.\n\nThough his combat experience made him a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left HIM cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

PitBrawler76.title: Pit brawler
PitBrawler76.desc: NAME was nine years old when HE got in HIS first fight. HECAP won, but more important was the enjoyment of HIS audience. Pit fighting turned out to be a lucrative career for those who could survive it. And it was even mostly legal.

PitGladiator19.title: Pit gladiator
PitGladiator19.desc: NAME was enslaved as a child and forced to fight creatures and other people in an underground fighting arena.\n\nHECAP showed an affinity for the sport, and eventually bought his own freedom. However, his time in the pits never brought him much intellectual stimulation.

PizzaLover94.title: Người yêu pizza
PizzaLover94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] yêu thích pizza boomrat. Hiếm khi ăn bất cứ thứ gì khác, anh ta có xu hướng sức khỏe kém và hấp thụ oxy thấp.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] thích đập vào hộp sọ của các sinh vật ngẫu nhiên để xem những gì bên trong.

PlagueChild44.title: Plague child
PlagueChild44.desc: Born on a world wracked by plague, both of NAME's parents were doctors. \n\nNAME was raised in reverse-quarantine, under the Hippocratic oath. HECAP experienced little social interaction. However, HE gained a lot of medical experience assisting in treatments.

PlagueDoctor31.title: Plague doctor
PlagueDoctor31.desc: NAME provided medical care on multiple plague-wracked worlds, always working under the Hippocratic oath. HECAP improved conditions for those under quarantine while administering complex medical treatments and developing medicines.\n\nHECAP never had time to enjoy a normal life outside of work.

PlagueProdigy12.title: Plague prodigy
PlagueProdigy12.desc: NAME's childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit his homeworld.\n\nHECAP watched his friends die, and his compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

PlagueSurvivor39.title: Plague survivor
PlagueSurvivor39.desc: NAME watched as a mysterious plague spread through his town, killing his family and friends.\n\nHECAP learned some medicine from watching the plague doctors, but was mentally scarred by the ordeal.

PlanetaryDiplomat7.title: Planetary diplomat
PlanetaryDiplomat7.desc: NAME's passion and profession was interplanetary politics. HE was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted HIMself to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

PoisonGardener29.title: Poison gardener
PoisonGardener29.desc: NAME spent almost all HIS time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.\n\nIn that time HE learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PoliticalActivist20.title: Political activist
PoliticalActivist20.desc: Matt was involved with a radical political faction which worked against his homeworld's government.\n\nThe guerilla tactics training that Matt received from his associates gave him the skills to fight, but also drove him to compromise his own beliefs.

PoliticalAssassin46.title: Political assassin
PoliticalAssassin46.desc: Matis realized that his true calling was in physical solutions to diplomatic problems. He sought training from the assassins guild on Ceti V.\n\nHe was a quick study at the arts of subterfuge and death. He soon earned the guild rank of Deathjack.

Politician57.title: Politician
Politician57.desc: NAME was an activist in a powerful political faction. There HE learned the art of persuasion and speech.\n\nHECAP had many enemies, so HE took secret courses in shooting and hand-to-hand combat.

PoorKid18.title: Poor kid
PoorKid18.desc: Abandoned by his parents, NAME learned how to survive by himself before he was ten years old.

PopIdol59.title: Pop idol
PopIdol59.desc: Min performed and did interviews constantly. She refined her skills in dancing and singing, and became a master of social presentation.

PopIdolPirate39.title: Pop idol pirate
PopIdolPirate39.desc: NAME and her fans set out as a space pirate crew. She raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread her name.\n\nNAME became afraid of fire when a rival burned her stage down. She relied on her fans to do the work she found unappealing.

PowerMadScholar30.title: Power-mad scholar
PowerMadScholar30.desc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within NAME, and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, HE would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

PrisonerOfWar2.title: Prisoner of war
PrisonerOfWar2.desc: NAME was captured and put on death row for war crimes.\n\nFortunately for her, someone cut the power to her cell block. Riots ignited. Guards and trained wargs were deployed to quell the uprising. Organizing a few other inmates, NAME escaped in a small spacecraft.

PrivateDetective66.title: Private detective
PrivateDetective66.desc: As a private eye, sharp wits and a silver tongue were NAME's greatest tools. HECAP often spent HIS nights working cases that ranged from uncovering affairs and learning trade secrets to solving murder cases and infiltrating criminal organizations. There wasn't a case HE wouldn't accept for the right price.

PrivilegedChild86.title: đứa trẻ đặc quyền
PrivilegedChild86.desc: Sinh ra trong một gia đình thuộc tầng lớp thượng lưu, [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên với tất cả những điều tốt nhất - giáo dục tốt nhất, liên hệ xã hội tốt nhất và tất nhiên là tiền công nghệ tốt nhất có thể mua.\n\nThật không may, sống trong sự suy đồi như vậy đã khiến [PAWN_nameDef] khá hư hỏng khi chuyển dạ.

PrivilegedProdigy70.title: Privileged prodigy
PrivilegedProdigy70.desc: NAME was recognized as gifted early in his glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, HIS family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. HIS training included science, leadership, and the arts.

ProdigalStudent67.title: Prodigal student
ProdigalStudent67.desc: NAME was a faithful student, and was dedicated to learning anything and everything he could about humanity and its creations.\n\nWhile HE was shunned as a nerd, HE didn't mind. HECAP hoped for a brighter future.

ProfessionalGamer76.title: Professional gamer
ProfessionalGamer76.desc: NAME was obsessed with video games since his hands were big enough to grip a joystick.\n\nHECAP achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when he retired early in his teenage years.

ProjectSubject99.title: Project subject
ProjectSubject99.desc: NAME was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project".\n\nDue to memory blockages, however, he remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

ProstheticSurgeon0.title: bác sĩ phẫu thuật chi giả
ProstheticSurgeon0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã sử dụng tài năng [PAWN_possessive] cho các bộ phận giả để 'thăng tiến' người khác bằng cách thay thế tay chân và nội tạng bằng kim loại và điện tử.

ProstituteIdol28.title: Prostitute idol
ProstituteIdol28.desc: After HIS father was deposed, NAME's beauty led HIM to be forced into pornography to survive.\n\nOver years of difficult treatments, HIS body was remodeled to appear temporarily ageless. Sold to an orbital brothel, HE became popular, with a steady stream of clients from all over the planet.

PsychiatricPatient94.title: Psychiatric patient
PsychiatricPatient94.desc: NAME spent most of HIS adult life in an insane asylum. HIS industrial homeworld had a poor understanding of mental illness, and HE was treated more like an animal than a person.\n\nThough HE eventually recovered and was released, HIS experience dampened many of HIS basic life skills.

PsychologyStudent15.title: Psychology student
PsychologyStudent15.desc: NAME researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars. \n\nHis dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

Punk30.title: nghèo hèn
Punk30.desc: NAME đã dành thời thơ ấu của mình để bán thuốc lá giả cho những đứa trẻ 15 tuổi. Thuốc lá thường đầy những mẩu cỏ.

PyroAssistant82.title: Pyro assistant
PyroAssistant82.desc: On an industrial world, NAME learned early that if HE wanted to eat, HE had to work. So work HE did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where HE was from, the safety laws were quite flexible.\n\nHECAP was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

Pyromaniac18.title: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac18.desc: From an early age, NAME had an unhealthy fascination with fire. HECAP would set refuse heaps ablaze and become so entranced by the flames HE would absent-mindedly burn HIMself.\n\nOne day while playing with matches, HE carelessly burned down HIS home.

QuietNerd97.title: mọt sách
QuietNerd97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] sống ở midworld và lớn lên trong sự đùm bọc thái quá của bố mẹ. Thay vì chơi với những đứa trẻ khác, [PAWN_pronoun] luôn cắm mặt vào sách.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] không đặc biệt cường tráng và gặp khó khăn với việc lao động chân tay.

RaiderKing38.title: Raider king
RaiderKing38.desc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, NAME rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Ranger6.title: Ranger
Ranger6.desc: NAME lived alone, deep in a forest. HECAP protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy HIS own material needs without outside help.

RangerChild57.title: Ranger child
RangerChild57.desc: NAME was raised in a forest. HISCAP father taught HIM to hunt and live off the land, so that HE could live without the need of others when father died.\n\nAccustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, NAME could survive weeks alone.

RebelChild8.title: Rebel child
RebelChild8.desc: NAME was born under authoritarian rule. Despite intense oppression from family and community, she never gave up fighting for her dignity and her freedom.\n\nShe was often put into hopeless situations where even family would try to terrorize her into propriety. She learned to trust no one.

RebelFighter39.title: Rebel fighter
RebelFighter39.desc: When civil war broke out Ade remained neutral to either side, until his biome was firebombed by a loyalist militia.\n\nLater, his unit gave him the nickname "Rare" after he burnt down the luxury villa of a loyalist leader, with them still inside it.

RebelSlave14.title: Rebel slave
RebelSlave14.desc: NAME was born into corporate slavery and raised to perform menial tasks for minimum pay. HECAP was just another cog in the machine. \n\nNAME found his freedom by joining a rebel organization whose goal was to break free from their corporate masters.

RebelStudent14.title: Rebel student
RebelStudent14.desc: NAME grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged him to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age.\n\nAs a bored student, HE found joy in challenging his teachers about the contradictions between his planet's official values and their government's policies.

RebelWriter82.title: Rebel writer
RebelWriter82.desc: Early on, NAME developed a talent for writing. HECAP was soon writing a popular online journal - anonymously, to hide HIS age - on topics ranging from bioethics to political theory and xenosociology.

ReclusiveChild81.title: Reclusive child
ReclusiveChild81.desc: NAME didn’t learn to speak until HE was nearly 5 years old, and, even then, HE preferred to keep to HIMself. When HE was in HIS early teens, HE made a habit of wandering off from the village to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

ReclusiveProdigy96.title: Reclusive prodigy
ReclusiveProdigy96.desc: Growing up on a flourishing glitterworld afforded Holly the chance to fully devote herself to her studies.\n\nHaving taken a keen interest in genetic modification and neural augmentation from a young age, she had little time (or desire) for a regular childhood.

Recruiter4.title: Recruiter
Recruiter4.desc: NAME was part of an revered order of martial artists, infamous both for their skill in combat and for their practice of refusing to treat their wounded.\n\nHECAP travelled HIS homeworld, judging the young people HE met to determine if they might be suitable for training.

ReEducatedYouth23.title: Re-educated youth
ReEducatedYouth23.desc: NAME lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth. \n\nHECAP was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

ReligiousHierarch16.title: Religious hierarch
ReligiousHierarch16.desc: Ordained as a priest in his local community, NAME used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.\n\nOne day, a merchant landed his spaceship near NAME's home. HECAP decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

RenegadeEngineer43.title: Renegade engineer
RenegadeEngineer43.desc: After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, Jered set his gaze on his homeworld.\n\nHe travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

RenownedProfessor51.title: giáo sư nổi tiếng
RenownedProfessor51.desc: Lòng từ bi và tình yêu tri thức không đáy của [PAWN_nameDef] đã đưa [PAWN_objective] đến với nghề giáo. [PAWN_pronoun] đã trở thành một trong những cái tên nổi tiếng nhất trong giới học thuật trong suốt thời của urbworld.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] các bài giảng holo được tôn kính bởi tất cả những người đã xem, và một vài sinh viên của [PAWN_pronoun] đã chấp nhận tham gia các hội thảo của [PAWN_possessive] để nói về lòng tốt và sự kiên nhẫn của [PAWN_possessive].

Reporter71.title: Reporter
Reporter71.desc: Candice spent many years as an investigative reporter. She was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations.\n\nAlthough seen as a lightweight by her critics, she managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

ReptileResearcher37.title: nhà nghiên cứu bò sát
ReptileResearcher37.desc: Sau khi rời khỏi vườn nho của cha mẹ [PAWN_possessive], [PAWN_nameDef] đã đi qua nhiều không gian được biết đến và học được nhiều kỹ năng trên đường đi.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã dành phần lớn thời gian [PAWN_possessive] để nghiên cứu và tương tác với các loài bò sát. [PAWN_pronoun] nổi tiếng vì đã tạo ra một số bước đột phá và khám phá ra "Quỷ dữ".

RichBoy9.title: Rich boy
RichBoy9.desc: NAME grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends.\n\nHECAP was always told by his father that 'those peasants just want your money'. So, HE spent most of his time alone, or fighting other kids.

RitualChild20.title: Ritual child
RitualChild20.desc: Born with a special mark on HIS neck, NAME's tribe chose to sacrifice HIM in a blood ritual. They left HIM in the forest to die. A pack of arctic wolves found and adopted HIM.\n\nOver time, HE learned to make tools to hunt with the pack.

Roboticist1.title: Roboticist
Roboticist1.desc: Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of NAME's ocean planet. HECAP created robots to replace them.\n\nOver time, he collected a small crew of robots to do his bidding. HECAP became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

Roboticist41.title: người máy
Roboticist41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] cảm thấy thoải mái hơn với robot và trí tuệ nhân tạo so với người hữu cơ, vì vậy [PAWN_pronoun] làm việc như một người máy. [PAWN_pronoun] quan tâm đặc biệt đến cơ khí và công nghệ cổ đại.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] dựa vào người khác cho các nhu cầu cơ bản của [PAWN_possessive].

RocketEngineer53.title: Rocket engineer
RocketEngineer53.desc: NAME won a grant to a top school and earned a degree in rocket engineering. After several years working for a space mining company she left to travel and see the universe.

RocketPioneer19.title: Rocket pioneer
RocketPioneer19.desc: As a self-taught engineer, NAME escaped his dying homeworld on a rocket HE built HIMself. \n\nHECAP later spent years of his life on several worlds, helping less-developed planets develop rocket technology.

RugbyPlayer71.title: Rugby player
RugbyPlayer71.desc: After years of addiction to virtual reality games, Douglas was saved when the doctors unplugged him.\n\nUnfortunately, they unplugged him during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged his real identity and his virtual identity, leaving him with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

RunawayDancer35.title: Runaway dancer
RunawayDancer35.desc: Grown by and for science, NAME gave it up. Instead, HECAP wanted to dance for crowds across many worlds, from the glamor of the glitterworlds to the dangers of the rim.\n\nSuch work required wearing a smile on HIS face and a pistol under HIS costume.

SanitationCaptain29.title: Sanitation captain
SanitationCaptain29.desc: After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.\n\nIt was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Scavenger22.title: Scavenger
Scavenger22.desc: NAME spent HIS childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through wrecks and ruins for treasures. HISCAP natural curiosity got HIM into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

Scavenger62.title: người hốt rác
Scavenger62.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên ở một trong số ít các thành phố còn lại trên thế giới bị tàn phá bởi chiến tranh hạt nhân.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã học cách sinh tồn trên chính [PAWN_possessive] trong vùng đất hoang tàn sau ngày tận thế này.

SchoolyardOutcast11.title: Sân trường lạc lõng
SchoolyardOutcast11.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] có một nền giáo dục khiêm tốn nhưng phù hợp. Mặc dù có nền tảng gia đình tốt và nhiều sự hỗ trợ, [PAWN_pronoun] đã đấu tranh để kết bạn và thường bị bắt nạt. [PAWN_pronoun] đã học cách làm việc hoặc chơi một mình và tránh giao tiếp xã hội để tránh xung đột.\n\nKhi xung đột xảy ra, [PAWN_nameDef] sẽ trả đũa dữ dội.

ScienceProdigy65.title: Science prodigy
ScienceProdigy65.desc: NAME was top of her class in chemistry, physics, exobiology, astronomy and opera.\n\nAn unfortunate lab accident left her with a deathly fear of fire.

Scout44.title: trinh sát
Scout44.desc: Sinh ra từ các thuộc địa cấp cao của một cường quốc nhỏ, [PAWN_nameDef] đã được ghi danh vào một chương trình thanh thiếu niên được dạy các kỹ năng trinh sát quân sự.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã học cách sinh tồn ở nơi hoang dã, vâng lời và không đặt câu hỏi.

Scrounger25.title: người ăn cắp
Scrounger25.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] sẵn sàng lặn vào các bãi rác để tìm kiếm những vật có giá trị và các mặt hàng mà mọi người quan tâm.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] không bao giờ bị làm phiền bởi mùi hôi thối, hoặc những nguy hiểm có thể khiến [PAWN_objective] bị thương trong nhiều tuần.

Sculptor63.title: nhà điêu khắc
Sculptor63.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] bắt đầu điêu khắc những khối đá có kích thước bằng người, nhưng [PAWN_pronoun] sớm bắt đầu nghĩ lớn hơn. Với sự giúp đỡ của robot khai thác, [PAWN_pronoun] đã học được cách khắc những tượng đài khổng lồ ra khỏi vách đá. Chẳng mấy chốc, các công viên tự nhiên của thế giới long lanh nơi [PAWN_pronoun] sống đầy những nhân vật đá khổng lồ.

SelflessHunter61.title: Selfless hunter
SelflessHunter61.desc: Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.\n\nAlong the way, he helped people in need.

SentimentalChild55.title: Sentimental child
SentimentalChild55.desc: NAME was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, HE tried to fix it. But, being a child, HE did not always succeed. This hurt his sensitive soul.\n\nHECAP dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

SerialMurderer47.title: Serial murderer
SerialMurderer47.desc: NAME started to enjoy killing people, so he did more often and perfected his methods. He lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours.\n\nHe enjoyed making artworks of his victims, and was known for leaving his signature on the bodies of those he killed.

ShadowMarine63.title: quân nhân chìm
ShadowMarine63.desc: sau khi hoàn thiện kĩ năng [PAWN_possessive] như một cớm chìm, [PAWN_nameDef] rời khỏi đơn vị [PAWN_possessive] để sử dụng các kỹ năng [PAWN_possessive] trên các hành tinh [PAWN_pronoun] cần trợ giúp.\n\nĐã quen thuộc với các lộ trình quỹ đạo thương mại, [PAWN_pronoun] có thể lên và xuống bất kỳ hành tinh nào mà không bị phát hiện..

ShamanOfShadows47.title: Shaman of shadows
ShamanOfShadows47.desc: When the monsters of fire came from the sky, NAME was called upon by HIS tribe to guide them into battle.\n\nNAME made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

ShelterChild50.title: Shelter child
ShelterChild50.desc: NAME grew up in a shelter deep beneath a toxic world. HECAP received a comprehensive education, but had no opportunity to do physical labour.

Sheriff52.title: Sheriff
Sheriff52.desc: NAME was the law enforcer in an isolated industrial town. HECAP was known for having an arrogant attitude and a mean streak. HECAP refused to lift so much as a finger unless it was for money, alcohol, or revenge.

ShipChild46.title: Ship child
ShipChild46.desc: NAME's family were space traders. One day, NAME's cryptosleep pod failed in transit. HECAP had to spend years awake on the ship as the other slept.\n\nHECAP filled HIS days creating beautiful contraptions from the ship's cargo - but HE didn't learn a lot of basic planetary living skills.

ShipTechnician0.title: Ship technician
ShipTechnician0.desc: NAME was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of her home system. In this job, she learned to fix and improve many machines.\n\nSometimes, her ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

ShockTrooper15.title: Shock trooper
ShockTrooper15.desc: NAME was in a deep space shock troop unit deployed on multiple planets in various wars.\n\nDuring a risky assault, HIS whole unit was wiped out. Nobody else knew what happened on the field that day, but NAME will carry the burden forever.

ShootingComa59.title: Shooting coma
ShootingComa59.desc: Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SicklyChild55.title: Sickly child
SicklyChild55.desc: As a child, NAME suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined in a research hospital, HE had minimal human contact and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however, HE became very familiar with science and medicine.

SicklyLawyer49.title: Sickly lawyer
SicklyLawyer49.desc: As a lawyer, Lynn could convict a deaf man for stealing music. His sharp mind and lack of empathy let him say anything to get the other person to talk. With the right amount of money, he knew, any case can be won.\n\nHis childhood cough never went away.

SicklyLiar3.title: Sickly liar
SicklyLiar3.desc: It is not uncommon for a sickly child to be cast away. What is uncommon is for that child to survive and even thrive with such a weak body.\n\nUsing his quick wit and silver tongue, Lynn was able to get out of almost any situation - most of the time at the cost others around him.

Sightseer70.title: người tham quan
Sightseer70.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đi du lịch qua các vì sao. [PAWN_pronoun] cùng với chi phí đi du lịch vừa đủ sống nên buộc phải làm các công việc lặt vặt trên các trạm không gian, nhưng tất cả đều đáng giá.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] thích cắm trại trên thế giới kỳ lạ và tìm hiểu mô hình của động vật hoang dã kỳ lạ. [PAWN_pronoun] không bao giờ có thể tập trung vào các nỗ lực trí tuệ, vì việc tham quan [PAWN_possessive] bị phân tâm [PAWN_objective] quá nhiều.

SlaveChemist84.title: Slave chemist
SlaveChemist84.desc: NAME became a gifted pharmaceutical scientist, but was captured by slavers. HECAP was sold to a warlord and forced to create drugs to test on other slaves. This left HIM with deep and troubling questions on the ethics of scientific research and medicine.

SlaveFarmer99.title: Slave farmer
SlaveFarmer99.desc: Abandoned as a little girl, NAME was found by a farmer. Being infertile himself, the farmer kept her as a slave. The constant beatings left her scarred and unable to handle violence. After many years, she ran away.

SmallTownKid41.title: trẻ làng
SmallTownKid41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lớn lên trong một ngôi làng giữa thế giới cô lập, được bao quanh bởi bò và những cánh đồng.\n\nCha mẹ của [PAWN_possessive] đã dạy [PAWN_objective] một loạt các kỹ năng nội trợ hữ ích, nhưng một tuổi thơ yên bình và an toàn đã làm cho [PAWN_objective] không biết gì nhiều về thế giới đáng sợ và khó khăn bên ngoài.

Smuggler23.title: Smuggler
Smuggler23.desc: As a contract pilot, Meredith had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught.\n\nShe eventually saved up enough to buy her own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing her goods in person.

SocialPariah3.title: Social pariah
SocialPariah3.desc: NAME's family never fit in. They were oddballs who couldn't conform to their regimented society. Because of this, they were forced into cryptosleep and sent to different rimworlds, never to see each other again.

SoftwareDeveloper84.title: nhà phát triền phần mềm
SoftwareDeveloper84.desc: Sau khi [PAWN_pronoun] có được khả năng sử dụng tự động hóa để loại bỏ tedium, [PAWN_nameDef] không còn có thể dung thứ cho giáo dục và việc làm truyền thống.

SoldierExperiment50.title: Soldier experiment
SoldierExperiment50.desc: NAME grew up believing HE was a normal, albeit slightly sheltered child.\n\nIn truth, HE was part of an elaborate experiment. Researchers were conditioning HIM using social interactions and mechanite injections to try to produce an elite soldier.

SoleSurvivor21.title: người duy nhất sống sót
SoleSurvivor21.desc: Hawke's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease.\n\nFound alone and adopted by another band, he never became close with the other tribe members. He preferred to stay away from his new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

SonOfAHuntress75.title: Son of a huntress
SonOfAHuntress75.desc: In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, Jon was raised by his tribal mother. She taught him survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing.\n\nHis departed father had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and Jon practiced with it every chance he got.

SpaceBartender0.title: Space bartender
SpaceBartender0.desc: NAME became a bartender on a space station. HECAP interacted with and befriended many strangers.\n\nAs time went on, NAME used HIS knowledge of herbs to craft HIS own strange concoctions for HIS customers.

SpaceCadet77.title: Space cadet
SpaceCadet77.desc: Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.\n\nHe served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SpaceExplorer53.title: Space explorer
SpaceExplorer53.desc: NAME once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. HECAP quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with HIS local enemies.\n\nThis long period alone left him without close friends. HISCAP heart is sensitive, but he learned to hide HIS emotions very well.

SpaceFanboy22.title: Space fanboy
SpaceFanboy22.desc: NAME dreamed of space travel. He built his own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

SpaceHumanitarian9.title: Space humanitarian
SpaceHumanitarian9.desc: After seeing the rampant poverty common on overcrowded urban worlds, NAME decided to dedicate HIS life to helping the less fortunate. This crusade taught HIM how to care for the sick and the hungry.

SpaceHunter79.title: Space hunter
SpaceHunter79.desc: Now a man as well as proficient hunter and marksman, Jon yearned for more. He took leave from his birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

SpaceMarine16.title: Space marine
SpaceMarine16.desc: Soren joined a squad of space marines known for their brutal efficiency at killing. His last name and his lack of emotion during combat inspired his nickname: Grim.

SpaceMarine51.title: chiến binh không gian
SpaceMarine51.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã được tuyển dụng vào lực lượng an ninh của một tập đoàn ngoài hành tinh.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] bảo vệ tàu của họ chống lại bọn cướp và tham gia vào các hợp đồng chiến tranh không gian.

SpaceMarine9.title: chiến binh không gian
SpaceMarine9.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là thành viên của một đơn vị chiến binh không gian đế quốc ưu tú. Được đào tạo bài bản, [PAWN_pronoun] đã phát triển các kỹ năng chiến đấu đáng chú ý.\n\nCác nghi lễ và tín ngưỡng gần như tôn giáo của [PAWN_possessive] đã giúp [PAWN_objective] giữ được nhiều hơn hoặc ít hơn thông qua sự khủng khiếp của chiến tranh.

SpaceMarine94.title: chiến binh không gian
SpaceMarine94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một chiến binh trong hải quân Hoàng gia.\n\ncông việc của [PAWN_possessive] là tông vào tàu của kẻ thù, bắn hạ thủy thủ đoàn và bắt giữ con tàu nguyên vẹn. Và [PAWN_pronoun] đã giỏi về nó.

SpaceMarineMedic10.title: bác sĩ quân dân không gian
SpaceMarineMedic10.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã tham gia một lực lượng viễn chinh liên lạc thuộc địa với tư cách là một bác sĩ. Nhiệm vụ trở nên tồi tệ khi những cư dân hóa ra đang phải chịu đựng bệnh dịch zombie. [PAWN_pronoun] đã chạy và chiến đấu trong nhiều ngày.\n\nMắc kẹt cùng những người bị thương, [PAWN_pronoun] đã xả đạn đủ để làm hao mòn bốn nòng súng máy và học được giá trị của hỏa lực lớn. Nhưng biệt danh [PAWN_possessive], Noob, bị mắc kẹt từ ngày đó trở đi.

SpaceMerchant97.title: Space merchant
SpaceMerchant97.desc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, NAME sought to dominate her romantic interests as much as her business adversaries. When she didn't have her own ship to fly, she worked charter ships for hire.

SpaceNavyDoctor72.title: Space navy doctor
SpaceNavyDoctor72.desc: NAME served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending HIS homeworld. HECAP learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

SpaceNavyTech12.title: hải quân công nghệ không gian
SpaceNavyTech12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã ở trong một hải quân vũ trụ cho hành tinh mạnh nhất trong nhóm sao địa phương. [PAWN_pronoun] đã phát triển các kỹ năng về bảo trì, hệ thống điện tử, radar và hình ảnh, và quản lý hậu cần.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] phục vụ với niềm tự hào và tình yêu nước cho hành tinh của [PAWN_possessive].

SpaceNerd97.title: kẻ đam mê không gian
SpaceNerd97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] chỉ muốn được ngầu như All-Might (siêu anh hùng yêu thích của [PAWN_possessive] ). [PAWN_pronoun] mơ ước được phiêu lưu vào không gian và khám phá những thế giới mới. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng mơ về sô cô la ... sô cô la không gian.

SpacePirate55.title: Space pirate
SpacePirate55.desc: Piracy appears everywhere that governments are weak and society spread thin. NAME was part of this age-old part of human existence, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit.

SpaceRaider71.title: Space raider
SpaceRaider71.desc: Tater was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, he became the feared enemy of many settlements.

SpaceResearcher25.title: Space researcher
SpaceResearcher25.desc: NAME inherited HIS parents' ship and carried on their research.\n\nHISCAP childhood experiences with diverse cultures allowed HIM to preserve his caring nature despite spending most of HIS life isolated in space.

SpacerOrphan77.title: trẻ mồ côi không gian
SpacerOrphan77.desc: Sinh ra giữa các ngôi sao trong một gia đình không gian vũ trụ, [PAWN_nameDef] là người duy nhất sống sót khi con tàu của gia đình [PAWN_possessive] bị phá hủy.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] buộc phải tìm cách sống sót và tìm kiếm niềm vui khi trong một gia đình khác.

SpaceshipChef41.title: Spaceship chef
SpaceshipChef41.desc: Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

SpaceshipSalesman34.title: Spaceship salesman
SpaceshipSalesman34.desc: Duster tried his hand at various jobs, including building space rabbit cages and working at a mutant wheat research project. Finally, he found his true calling as a spacecraft salesman. Specializing in recreational spacecraft, his smooth talk and charming nature served him well.

SpaceSmuggler6.title: Space smuggler
SpaceSmuggler6.desc: Tater's parents used him to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds.\n\nAided by his small size, Tater became very adept at carrying out his parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

SpaceStationCook63.title: Space station cook
SpaceStationCook63.desc: The space station NAME came from was far from any populated planets, and was in itself understaffed. For this reason, NAME was forced to learn how to cook in order to keep the crew alive. While HE appreciated this learning opportunity, HE didn't appreciate the criticism which came with it, and has had self-esteem issues ever since.

SpaceTechnician29.title: Space technician
SpaceTechnician29.desc: NAME finally managed to flee his criminal life by getting a maintenance job on a nearby space station. He performed multiple repairing and building operations. He also used to participate in basic research activities and often defused co-workers' arguments. He never liked doing art.

SpaceTrafficker68.title: Space trafficker
SpaceTrafficker68.desc: NAME discovered HE was heir of HIS distant uncle's weapons-trading business.\n\nTo protect the future of the company HE went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

SpecialForces53.title: Special forces
SpecialForces53.desc: Give me a reason to kill - a good reason!\n\nMarkus was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that HE entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. HECAP never imagined himself a lone hero, but HE played HIS part in the group well.

SpeederRacer71.title: Speeder racer
SpeederRacer71.desc: Rusty was the son of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia.\n\nHe found his first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of his homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced him to learn to defend himself with a quick word or a quicker shot.

Spiceminer9.title: Spiceminer
Spiceminer9.desc: NAME made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.\n\nLittle did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

SpoiledBrat59.title: Spoiled brat
SpoiledBrat59.desc: Born in a rich family, NAME was given everything, and never developed basic work ethic or the foundations of a non-dependent personality.\n\nHECAP was expected to become one of the best doctors in the world.

SpoiledChild33.title: Spoiled child
SpoiledChild33.desc: NAME grew up the child of an industrious colony manager. In this position, most manual and dangerous tasks were forbidden by HIS parents, but on the rim everyone has to dirty their hands.

SpoiledChild80.title: đứa trẻ hư hỏng
SpoiledChild80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là con của một kỹ sư không gian cần cù. Cha mẹ của [PAWN_possessive] cấm hầu hết các nhiệm vụ thủ công và nguy hiểm, vì vậy [PAWN_pronoun] đã học nghệ thuật và âm nhạc thay thế.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] yêu động vật, nhưng cha mẹ [PAWN_possessive] không bao giờ để [PAWN_objective] có thú cưng - mặc dù [PAWN_pronoun] chơi với thú cưng của người khác rất nhiều.

Spy58.title: Spy
Spy58.desc: NAME was trained by HIS government in infiltration and espionage. HECAP learned to keep a cool head and to talk HIS way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, HE was capable of more violent direct action.

Stableboy49.title: Stableboy
Stableboy49.desc: NAME was a stableboy on a medieval planet, mucking dung almost every day to earn his keep.\n\nBy the time HE was exiting childhood, NAME had saved up enough money to pay a space trader to take HIM offworld.

StalwartFarmer21.title: nông dân tầm cỡ
StalwartFarmer21.desc: Với trang trại bị đe dọa liên tục từ những lũ cướp, [PAWN_nameDef] đã học cách tự vệ bằng súng trường của cha mình. [PAWN_pronoun] cũng thành thạo cách xây dựng các bức tường để giữ vật nuôi và động vật ăn thịt ở bên ngoài.\n\nAnh ấy đã từng thử vẽ một bức tranh về ngôi nhà của mình, nhưng phát hiện ra rằng anh ấy chỉ có thể vẽ những nét vẽ nguệch ngoạc và con vịt.

StarfighterPilot79.title: Starfighter pilot
StarfighterPilot79.desc: After years of training and drilling, NAME finally became a starfighter pilot.\n\nHundreds of combat missions later, HE grew bored and started seeking newer thrills. HECAP joined a band of space pirates, which eagerly welcomed HIM because of HIS piloting skill.

StarforceCadet79.title: Starforce cadet
