StarforceCadet79.desc: Raised on Amen-Ti, glitterworld capital of the Star Empire, Sam Wissa had an easy childhood.\n\nAs a youth, Sam decided that joining the Starforce would be his way of giving back to the Empire.

StarKnight5.title: Star knight
StarKnight5.desc: Abducted from his medieval homeworld, NAME later escaped his captors via an impressive display of swordsmanship.\n\nFor a moment, as he drifted in the escape pod, his childhood dream of becoming a knight among the stars felt so real. Then he crash-landed.

StarshipDoctor37.title: Starship doctor
StarshipDoctor37.desc: NAME was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

StarshipJanitor33.title: Starship janitor
StarshipJanitor33.desc: While other passengers pass the years between star systems in cryptosleep sarcophagi, NAME had to wake up at periodic intervals to perform inspections, check the navigation systems, and to oil the mechanoids.

StarSquire9.title: Star squire
StarSquire9.desc: Born on a medieval world, NAME's first memory is of gazing up into the night's sky. \n\nEver since, HE dreamed of squiring for a knight amidst the star-filled heavens. HISCAP focus on that vision left HIM somewhat single-minded.

StateEngineer60.title: State engineer
StateEngineer60.desc: NAME enrolled in the state weapons research program.\n\nWhile brilliant in his work, he was so enthusiastic in testing his creations that he accidentally wounded some colleagues and was marked as unfit for service.

StationSecurity38.title: Station security
StationSecurity38.desc: NAME was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There he prevented illegal human trafficking.\n\nOnce, fire broke out on the station, and HE saved many from the flames. Since then, HE has avoided fires.

StationWhelp94.title: Station whelp
StationWhelp94.desc: NAME spent his childhood as a penniless orphan living on a space station. He managed to scrape by doing filthy jobs and stealing. He became so violent due to poor treatment by his “betters” that he was banished from the station, just to be picked up by space pirates.

SteamworldTinker38.title: steamworld tinker
SteamworldTinker38.desc: Trong khu ổ chuột của một thế giới hơi nước, [PAWN_nameDef] đã phát triển niềm đam mê với máy móc và thiết bị. [PAWN_pronoun] nhận ra [PAWN_pronoun] thích công ty của họ hơn công ty của người khác.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] Khéo léo kiếm được [PAWN_objective] một nguồn thu nhập ổn dịnh và [PAWN_pronoun] đã chi từng xu cho các linh kiện và công cụ mà anh ấy thích.

StellarPirate10.title: Stellar pirate
StellarPirate10.desc: NAME was captain of a pirate ship. HECAP and his crew made their living capturing traders who wandered off-course.\n\nHECAP was known for HIS balanced approach to problems, building, fighting, or negotiating as needed.

StilettoAssassin34.title: Stiletto assassin
StilettoAssassin34.desc: Because of her skills, NAME developed a sense of superiority. In time, she lost her sense of empathy. She often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person.\n\nAfter realizing her talents, she became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

Storyteller63.title: Storyteller
Storyteller63.desc: NAME traveled his world recounting the legends that he had studied.\n\nObsessed with the legends of his people, NAME seeks someone who can help him grow scales on his skin, so he too can be as the ancients were.

StoryWriter67.title: Story writer
StoryWriter67.desc: As a child, NAME was addicted to reading. HECAP would spend all day in HIS local library with HIS nose in a book. When budget cuts forced the library to close, NAME was distraught. HE decided to fill the gap by writing HIS own stories instead.

Straggler71.title: Straggler
Straggler71.desc: Despite being blessed with parental love, NAME hardly knew his parents.\n\nHECAP was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

StreetChild4.title: Street child
StreetChild4.desc: NAME's drug addict mother died, leaving HIM an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, HE resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When NAME was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took HIM in to give HIM a second chance at life.

StreetKid19.title: Street kid
StreetKid19.desc: Growing up on the streets of the a desert planet, NAME's his only friend was a dog named Rest. The pair scraped by, finding just enough food to survive.\n\nWhen HE was 13 years old, an interplanetary criminal group took HIM under their wing.

StreetPeddler66.title: Street peddler
StreetPeddler66.desc: Growing up on an industrial midworld where robberies and muggings weren't uncommon, NAME helped support his family by making small trinkets and novelties to sell to passers-by.\n\nHECAP learned early on that it wasn't always what HE knew, but who HE knew that would get HIM far in life.

StreetUrchin45.title: bụi đời đường phố
StreetUrchin45.desc: Sau khi chạy trốn khỏi nhà, [PAWN_nameDef] phải sống trên đường phố.\n\nCô lớn lên nhanh chóng, và biết sớm rằng cô phải tìm ra cách đánh lừa mọi người để kết nối với cô.

Student65.title: Student
Student65.desc: NAME studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.\n\nHECAP was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

StudentEngineer81.title: Student engineer
StudentEngineer81.desc:
A genius child, NAME was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering.

One day, he tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit him, earning him the nickname “Squirrel Boy.”

NAME came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath HIM.

StudentSocialite89.title: Student socialite
StudentSocialite89.desc: Matis learned politics in an elite training school for socially gifted students on Kalthas IV.\n\nWhile he was naturally adept at reading and manipulating people, he found no joy in it. He left the academy several years before graduation.

SuperSoldier99.title: Super soldier
SuperSoldier99.desc: NAME's government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.\n\nMost infants died, but NAME did not. He killed his first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

SystemLord77.title: System lord
SystemLord77.desc: For NAME, ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. HECAP sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

SystemsEngineer1.title: Systems engineer
SystemsEngineer1.desc: Like HIS father, NAME was a systems engineer. HECAP was qualified in both colony and ship systems.\n\nWhen not working, HE would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, HE did these things mostly alone.

Taster16.title: Taster
Taster16.desc: As the taster for a medieval king, any dish served at the royal table had to be sampled first by NAME. HECAP lived a decadent lifestyle at court, getting fat and doing very little work.

Taxonomist0.title: Taxonomist
Taxonomist0.desc: NAME travelled between star systems, studying and classifying the plant and animal life HE found in the hopes of creating a complete catalogue.

Teacher20.title: Teacher
Teacher20.desc: NAME was educated in the liberal arts and taught at a public school. HECAP was widely knowledgeable and well-liked by HIS students.

TechEnthusiast28.title: Tech enthusiast
TechEnthusiast28.desc: Michael had all the latest gadgets as a child. He spent all his time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. He always felt awkward around new people.

TechHead8.title: Tech-head
TechHead8.desc: Standing on the ship hull with his father in an child-size EVA suit, NAME loved space from a young age.\n\nHECAP was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like HIS father, HE spent HIS time taking care of plants in HIS messy room. HISCAP nickname was given for HIS love of circles.

TechnicalKid1.title: Đứa trẻ kỹ thuật
TechnicalKid1.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] không yêu gì thêm sau đó để quên thế giới xung quanh [PAWN_objective] và tập trung vào nhiệm vụ trong tầm tay.

TechnologyDoctor35.title: Technology doctor
TechnologyDoctor35.desc: NAME performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation.\n\nHECAP loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

TechScholar75.title: Tech scholar
TechScholar75.desc: NAME was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology.\n\nHECAP strived every day to expand his intellectual abilities.

TestSubject15.title: đối tượng thử nghiệm
TestSubject15.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã đăng ký vào một nghiên cứu khoa học hứa rằng nó có thể làm cho [PAWN_objective] thông minh hơn. Thật không may, các tác dụng phụ rất khác so với anh ta mong đợi. [PAWN_pronoun] đã phát điên và giết chết một số người trước khi thoát khỏi quê nhà của anh ta.

TestSubject90.title: Test subject
TestSubject90.desc: Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent her childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests.\n\nHer only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

TheaterTechnician80.title: Kỹ thuật viên sân khấu
TheaterTechnician80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã dành vô số giờ phía sau hậu trường của một nhà hát nổi tiếng. [PAWN_pronoun] đã tạo cảnh quan, đèn được lập trình và giám sát các bộ máy di chuyển.\n\nKết thúc nhiệm vụ, [PAWN_pronoun] sẽ nói chuyện với các thành viên trong đoàn. Điều hướng bộ phim xã hội của các diễn viên đã giúp [PAWN_pronoun] học cách giao tiếp tốt và thao túng người khác.

Tinkerer79.title: thợ vụng vặt
Tinkerer79.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] đã dành [PAWN_possessive] thời gian rảnh rỗi để tạo ra những thứ từ trí tưởng tượng của mình từ kim loại phế liệu và máy móc bị loại bỏ.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] đã tạo ra các robot đơn giản và các công cụ nhỏ, cho cả mục đích giải trí và tiện ích.

Tinkerer86.title: thợ vụng vặt
Tinkerer86.desc:
"Cái này hoạt động ra sao?

Tại sao điều này di chuyển?

Có lẽ nếu tôi thay đổi điều này ... ôi, tôi hy vọng nó hoạt động tốt hơn ... hoặc có thể tôi đã phá vỡ nó ... "

ToasterRepairman22.title: Toaster repairman
ToasterRepairman22.desc: Good with his hands and passionate about technology, NAME aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change his home world forever.\n\nA few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, he gave up on his dream and took a job more befitting his skill set.

ToolMechanic77.title: Tool mechanic
ToolMechanic77.desc: NAME was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world.\n\nAfter his firm closed due to scandal, HE joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing HIS wares between settlements.

Torturer37.title: Torturer
Torturer37.desc: Working for a tyrannical monarch on a medieval world, NAME earned a reputation as an expert in 'persuasion.' Any prisoner who went down into the dungeons left with no secrets - and with NAME's smile scarred permanently into their nightmares.

ToxicChild96.title: Toxic child
ToxicChild96.desc: Growing up on a an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him mentally scarred.\n\nHe eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

TradersChild62.title: Traders' child
TradersChild62.desc: NAME grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds.\n\nNAME learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in his parents' business.

TragicLoner87.title: Tragic loner
TragicLoner87.desc: NAME was involved in a traumatic accident that resulted in HIM killing HIS own family.\n\nCast out from society, HE was left with only HIS animal companions and several engineering textbooks to keep HIM company.

TraineeAlchemist64.title: Trainee alchemist
TraineeAlchemist64.desc: NAME grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

TransferStudent10.title: Transfer student
TransferStudent10.desc: A midworld child, NAME's wealthy parents sent HIM to a nearby glitterworld to receive a better education.\n\nNAME was a talented student. However, due to his family's wealth, HE never had to do dumb labor.

TraumatizedYouth87.title: Traumatized youth
TraumatizedYouth87.desc: NAME lived on a pleasant midworld.\n\nHISCAP prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, NAME's father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. NAME's father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

TreasureHunter82.title: Treasure hunter
TreasureHunter82.desc:
NAME explored outer rim planets in hopes of finding rare treasures.

After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, HE was betrayed by HIS men. HECAP survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.

HECAP created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help HIM seek revenge.

TribalThunderer45.title: Tribal thunderer
TribalThunderer45.desc: Years ago, NAME's tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. NAME is such a child.

TribeChild40.title: Tribe child
TribeChild40.desc: NAME grew up in the tribe, running around the village, moving with the muffalo herds, learning essential skills from HIS parents.\n\nHECAP never learned to read and never saw a machine that wasn't an ancient ruin.

TurtleHerder41.title: người chăn rùa
TurtleHerder41.desc: Sinh ra đã là dân du mục, gia đình của [PAWN_nameDef] có một đàn rùa yêu quý, người đã bảo vệ chúng bằng cách hấp thụ những cú đánh từ những kẻ cướp.\n\nKhi còn trẻ, [PAWN_pronoun] được giao chăm sóc những con rùa. [PAWN_pronoun] đã nhân giống chúng, thành công - quá thành công. Những đàn rùa khổng lồ đã tiêu thụ mọi nguồn thức ăn và phá hủy hệ sinh thái địa phương.

Undertaker93.title: Undertaker
Undertaker93.desc: NAME roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

UnethicalDoctor29.title: Unethical doctor
UnethicalDoctor29.desc: NAME became a doctor to save lives and research medicine. HECAP soon realized the only way to make progress on HIS research was to perform experiments on human patients.\n\nHECAP often used patients for HIS experiments - whether they were willing or not.

UnstableButcher31.title: Unstable butcher
UnstableButcher31.desc: John began hearing voices. The animals were talking to him, insulting him. He came to hate them, and eventually killed his furry former friends. He started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

UpperUrbworlder12.title: Upper urbworlder
UpperUrbworlder12.desc: NAME had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, HE spent most of HIS time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through HIS window.

UprightDiplomat49.title: Upright diplomat
UprightDiplomat49.desc: As a diplomat, NAME was assigned to deal with diplomatic tasks in the blood-soaked outer rim sectors.\n\nHECAP hoped to end the endless wars, until HIS consularship, the St. Anthem, was attacked by a raider fleet.

UrbworldArmyBrat84.title: Urbworld army brat
UrbworldArmyBrat84.desc: NAME grew up on an urbworld military base. HECAP was too young to fight, but HE learned to make HIMself useful in other ways.\n\nHECAP became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

UrbworldCriminal80.title: Urbworld criminal
UrbworldCriminal80.desc: Born into bad circumstance on an overpopulated urbworld, Vladimir turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia.\n\nRobbery and murder were daily activities for him. Vladimir learned that surviving was winning.

UrbworldEnforcer11.title: Urbworld enforcer
UrbworldEnforcer11.desc: NAME was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld.\n\nShe dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

UrbworldEntrepreneur14.title: Urbworld entrepreneur
UrbworldEntrepreneur14.desc: In the urbworlds, most suffer. But someone has to run the corporations.\n\nNAME learned the skills of the trade - greasing palms and technical analysis. HECAP is a sociointellectual machine.

UrbworldHooligan12.title: Urbworld hooligan
UrbworldHooligan12.desc: NAME grew up in a dangerous urbworld. He quickly learned how to get his daily meal - by crime. Such means left little to no space for cooking and growing activities.

UrbworldPimp93.title: Urbworld pimp
UrbworldPimp93.desc: At first, NAME made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, he switched to selling women and made a fortune.\n\nHECAP developed great skills with his fists. He also learned to fix up the injuries HE inflicted on the girls.

UrbworldPolitican92.title: Urbworld politican
UrbworldPolitican92.desc: It's no secret that the Companies own much of the urbworlds, but someone has to take the bribes. Vladimir was one such figurehead.\n\nHe learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

UrbworldSergeant50.title: Urbworld sergeant
UrbworldSergeant50.desc: NAME's passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.\n\nAfter enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

UrbworldSexSlave25.title: Urbworld sex slave
UrbworldSexSlave25.desc: Emmie was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against her masters, she was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

UrbworldUrchin61.title: Urbworld urchin
UrbworldUrchin61.desc: The urbworlds - ancient and deep industrial cityscapes bursting with humanity and poison. NAME grew up in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. HECAP had to fight for every scrap of food.

UrbworldUrchin90.title: urbworld láu cá
UrbworldUrchin90.desc: Bị bỏ rơi giữa các ngọn tháp bê tông bẩn thỉu, cha mẹ [PAWN_nameDef] không bao giờ biết [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] không bao giờ nhận được giáo dục chính thức, và thường dùng đến lao động nam tính để đổi lấy thức ăn. Đôi khi [PAWN_pronoun] nói dối, lừa dối và đánh cắp để sống sót.

Vagabond73.title: Vagabond
Vagabond73.desc: NAME awoke on a dangerous planet with no resources and few survival skills. HECAP bounced between camps, doing whatever work needed to be done, just to see the sun rise once more.

VatgrownAssassin20.title: Vatgrown assassin
VatgrownAssassin20.desc: Vas was not made as a man, but a cold hearted assassin. He was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. He was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

VatgrownMedic53.title: Vatgrown medic
VatgrownMedic53.desc: Raised to be a combat medic, NAME was trained in firearms as well as medicine. His favorite phrase when coming upon a wounded soldier was "Life or death?" Most chose life.

VatgrownScientist91.title: Vatgrown scientist
VatgrownScientist91.desc: NAME was grown to be a perfect scientist, with a mind perfectly tuned for physics and chemistry.\n\nHISCAP creators used HIM as a teaching aid on mind design, hoping HE would eventually grow to be a great mind and continue their research.

VatgrownSlavegirl67.title: Vatgrown slavegirl
VatgrownSlavegirl67.desc: Emmie was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, she was taught only to cook, clean and serve her masters. For most of her childhood, she knew nothing else.

VatgrownSoldier8.title: Vatgrown soldier
VatgrownSoldier8.desc: NAME wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during HIS accelerated growth, NAME still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.

VengefulChild43.title: Vengeful child
VengefulChild43.desc: As a child, NAME returned to HIS village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. HECAP swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.

VengefulExplorer54.title: Vengeful explorer
VengefulExplorer54.desc: A violent drifter without a home, NAME and his father fought many battles across hundreds of years. HECAP became a grizzled fighter and crack shot.\n\nAfter his father's death in battle, NAME began exploring the stars alone, seeking his father's killer, on the hunt for revenge.

VersatileWorker13.title: Versatile worker
VersatileWorker13.desc: Spending his later teenage years in a colony of settlers, he offered what little skills he had to anyone who would take him.\n\nBeing a quick learner, he honed many of his skills and, apart from his crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

Veterinarian99.title: Veterinarian
Veterinarian99.desc: NAME treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected HIS stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years HE lived as a vegetarian, rejecting the meat-loving culinary tradition of HIS homeworld.

VideoGamer55.title: video gamer
VideoGamer55.desc: Ryan was raised in a glitterworld. Everything he wanted came to him. In school he was a social butterfly. At home, he spent his time looking up the newest gadgets and playing his favourite video games.

VideoProducer83.title: Video producer
VideoProducer83.desc: Too awkward to socialize, NAME found comfort in the production of videos. Oddly, people enjoyed his videos, calling them "perfect sitcom dramas".\n\nNAME took advantage of this and broadcast more, ever hopeful that HE would be contacted by the Wizards.

VidtubeStar98.title: ngôi sao Vidtube
VidtubeStar98.desc: Sở thích của NAME là tạo video cho dịch vụ chia sẻ video phổ biến VidTube. HECAP đã thực hiện mọi thứ, từ đánh giá trò chơi video đến hướng dẫn nấu mì ống.\n\nHECAP đã đạt được hơn một triệu người theo dõi.

Villain89.title: Villain
Villain89.desc: After rising to the top of his criminal band, NAME was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

VinhoKing98.title: Vinho king
VinhoKing98.desc: After prohibition came to Aracena VI, NAME expanded his underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called him the Vinho King.\n\nThough HE mostly controlled his competition by masterful political maneuvering, HE was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

VoidRaider74.title: Void raider
VoidRaider74.desc: Craving adventure and glory, NAME set out across the void with a raider band, swearing his loyalty to his band and brothers, and spreading their glory through the stars with his blade and pistol in hand.

VoidspaceRaider94.title: Voidspace raider
VoidspaceRaider94.desc: After years of seeking the assassin that broke up his family, NAME was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. He accepted, hoping to find the killer he sought.\n\nDue to HIS seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, he earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of his luck.

VoyagerChild94.title: Voyager child
VoyagerChild94.desc: NAME was raised on an R&D starship, and spent most of HIS childhood travelling through the void.\n\nApproaching a mysterious planetoid, the ship was severely damaged. HIS next memory is of the ship heading out of orbit, fully repaired. HE soon developed an unnatural gift for technological research.

VRAddict29.title: VR addict
VRAddict29.desc: Douglas was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by his spinal plug. He moved through his daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around him. This left him nearly unable to socialize.

VRDesigner87.title: VR designer
VRDesigner87.desc: NAME designed virtual reality simulations for glitterworld citizens. HECAP paid great attention to the details of HIS worlds, including learning all HE could about plant life to make HIS landscapes more realistic.

WanderingCrafter42.title: Wandering crafter
WanderingCrafter42.desc: NAME continued to follow HIS parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and HE often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put HIS skills to good use.

WanderingHealer52.title: Wandering healer
WanderingHealer52.desc: NAME studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with HIS practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld.\n\nInstead, HE chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed HIM most.

WarChief97.title: War chief
WarChief97.desc: NAME was a tribal gang leader on a neolithic planet. For him, the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.

WarChild24.title: War child
WarChild24.desc: Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

Warlordess14.title: nữ lãnh chúa
Warlordess14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là thủ lĩnh cứng rắn của một nhóm cướp biển.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] sẽ chấp nhận mọi thách thức, bất kể bạo lực hay nguy hiểm. Những người khác gọi [PAWN_pronoun] một cỗ máy giết chóc.

WarRefugee51.title: War refugee
WarRefugee51.desc: A war broke on out NAME's home planet.\n\nGathering what little food and belongings they could, NAME and his father stole a ship and escaped into space.

Warrior73.title: chiến binh
Warrior73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một anh hùng chiến tranh trong cuộc chiến tranh thế giới thứ ba của hành tinh [PAWN_possessive]. [PAWN_pronoun] đã giúp ngăn chặn việc phóng vũ khí hạt nhân trong thời gian chờ đợi đặc biệt căng thẳng.

Warrior94.title: chiến binh
Warrior94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] là một chiến binh đáng sợ, thành thạo nhiều vũ khí. [PAWN_pronoun] đã tham gia vào nhiều trận chiến.

WarshipCaptain67.title: Warship captain
WarshipCaptain67.desc: Years of being commanding officer of an advanced corvette taught NAME the art of leadership, the techniques of higher engineering, and how to stay calm while enemies try to kill you.\n\nUnfortunately, NAME only very rarely had contact with nature.

WastelandWanderer81.title: Wasteland wanderer
WastelandWanderer81.desc: Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, NAME was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed his ancestral home.\n\nThe boy managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath his family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

WealthyStudent59.title: Wealthy student
WealthyStudent59.desc: NAME was born on a wealthy glitterworld. HECAP studied at the Caspian school of Engineering, and excelled in mathematics and computer programming.\n\nNAME grew up in clean, sterile environments. HECAP never saw a farm or livestock.

Weaver63.title: Weaver
Weaver63.desc: NAME was an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for HIS kin. HISCAP beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.

WhiteHatHacker82.title: White-hat hacker
WhiteHatHacker82.desc: From HIS computer, NAME helped rid the online world of bad people.

WildChild5.title: Wild child
WildChild5.desc: NAME was abandoned on a toxic world overgrown with hostile plant life. HECAP became accustomed early to the cold burn of loneliness.\n\nHE learned to fight, but ate his food raw and uncooked.

WildlifeRanger99.title: Wildlife ranger
WildlifeRanger99.desc: Dismayed at the poachers driving several animal species to near-extinction, NAME became a wildlife ranger. HECAP cared for and protect the animals - by force if necessary.\n\nHECAP grew to hate people slaughtering animals for luxury and profit.

Winerunner8.title: Winerunner
Winerunner8.desc: Abandoned by his parents, NAME was raised by the monks of the Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos monastery on Aracena VI.\n\nThe monks taught him discipline and hard work. In return, HE would go into the city and 'acquire' exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

WolfPackMember26.title: Wolf pack member
WolfPackMember26.desc: NAME was discarded by HIS family. Raised by wolves, HE ran, hunted, and defended HIS pack.\n\nHECAP learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. HECAP also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

WorkCampSlave37.title: Work camp slave
WorkCampSlave37.desc: NAME grew up as a slave to a particularly nasty noble family on a medieval world. \n\nWhile he received no formal education, the harsh labor regimen made his body strong.

WorldSlider42.title: World slider
WorldSlider42.desc: NAME was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. HECAP learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. HECAP also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

WreckageExplorer93.title: Wreckage explorer
WreckageExplorer93.desc: Two generations before NAME was born, an apocalyptic war dragged HIS home planet into anarchy. NAME was tasked with watching HIS tribe's herds, but often shirked HIS duties to go exploring the crashed warships scattered around the planet.

YoungMaster23.title: Young master
YoungMaster23.desc: Born to two medics, NAME longed for power. HISCAP keen intellect and charisma helped HIM gain the respect of HIS peers.\n\nDeciding that the best way to gain power was to climb the ranks of the imperial military, HE joined at the youngest possible age.

YoungPirate71.title: Young pirate
YoungPirate71.desc: NAME was born to pirates, in a dirty metal room that smelled of motor oil.\n\nHECAP was never exactly taught anything, but HE still learned the ways of survival, barter, and combat.

YoungPsychologist58.title: Young psychologist
YoungPsychologist58.desc: NAME was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of HIS mother's cab.\n\nWatching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, HE soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

YouthDelinquent30.title: Youth delinquent
YouthDelinquent30.desc: NAME was the only child of celebrity sommeliers. Her parents expected her to take up the family profession, but after her third admission to a youth detention center, this career path became unlikely.\n\nWhile in detention, NAME became skilled at making shanks and developed an interest in orinthology.

YouthSoldier99.title: Youth soldier
YouthSoldier99.desc: NAME was born into a long line of soldiers. He followed that heritage, joining a military training program.\n\nHe excelled in all physical training programs in his Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, NAME learned the value of hard work and suffering.
